            class Api::AudioSegmentsController < Api::BaseController

              def upload_request
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                audio_segment = @project.audio_segments.build(audio_segment_params)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                audio_segment.upload_status = 'pending'
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if audio_segment.save
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # Generate S3 pre-signed URL using centralized service
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  s3_service = S3Service.new(current_user)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  s3_result = s3_service.generate_upload_url(
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    record_id: audio_segment.id,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    record_type: 'audio_segment',
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    filename: audio_segment.file_name,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    content_type: audio_segment.mime_type,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    expires_in: 3600
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  )
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    audio_segment_id: audio_segment.id,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    upload_url: s3_result[:url],
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    expires_at: 1.hour.from_now.iso8601
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  render_error(
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    audio_segment.errors.full_messages.join(", "),
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    "VALIDATION_ERROR",
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32.

      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end

              end
          
      36.

              def upload_complete
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                begin
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  audio_segment = @project.audio_segments.find(params[:audio_segment_id])
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  return render_error(
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    "Audio segment not found",
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    "SEGMENT_NOT_FOUND",
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    :not_found
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  )
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                if params[:upload_status] == 'success'
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  audio_segment.update!(upload_status: 'success')
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # Trigger transcription processing
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  TranscriptionService.trigger_transcription_job(audio_segment.id)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    message: 'Audio segment processing initiated',
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    status: 'processing_started'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  audio_segment.update!(upload_status: 'failed')
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  render_error(
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    params[:error_message] || 'Upload failed',
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    "UPLOAD_FAILED",
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    :bad_request
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  )
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67.

              def playback_url
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                begin
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  audio_segment = @project.audio_segments.find(params[:id])
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  return render_error(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    "Audio segment not found",
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    "SEGMENT_NOT_FOUND",
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    :not_found
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  )
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # Only allow playback for successfully uploaded segments
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                unless audio_segment.upload_status == 'success' || audio_segment.upload_status == 'transcribed'
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  return render_error(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    'Audio segment not available for playback',
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    "SEGMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE",
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

                begin

                  s3_service = S3Service.new(current_user)

      97.

                  render json: {
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    playback_url: playback_url,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100.

      101.

      102.

                rescue => e

              def transcription_details
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                begin
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116.

    117. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      118.

      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    "Audio segment not found",
          
      120.

      121.

      124.

                unless audio_segment.transcribed?

    133. 
            

            

                # Return the detailed transcription data with word-level timestamps

      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135.

      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141.

      142.

              end

              def set_project
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                unless current_user.present?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  return render json: { error: 'Authentication required to access project data.' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                @project = current_user.projects.find(params[:project_id] || params[:id])
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Project not found or you do not have access to it.' }, status: :not_found
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155.

              def audio_segment_params
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                params.permit(:file_name, :mime_type, :recorded_duration_seconds, :question_id).tap do |permitted|
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  permitted[:duration_seconds] = permitted.delete(:recorded_duration_seconds) if permitted[:recorded_duration_seconds]
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            end
          
      163.

            class Api::AuthController < Api::BaseController

              skip_before_action :authenticate_api_request!, only: [:register, :login, :refresh]

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Comprehensive test coverage with happy/sad paths

              def register
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Registration attempt for email: #{params[:user][:email] rescue 'unknown'}"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User params received: #{user_params.inspect}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                user = User.new(user_params)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User object created, valid: #{user.valid?}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if user.valid?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User validation passed, attempting save..."
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] User validation failed: #{user.errors.full_messages}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                if user.save
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User saved successfully with ID: #{user.id}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Generating token pair..."
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  tokens = JwtService.generate_token_pair(user.id)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Tokens generated - AccessToken length: #{tokens[:access_token].length}, RefreshToken length: #{tokens[:refresh_token].length}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Updating user with refresh token digest..."
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  user.update!(refresh_token_digest: BCrypt::Password.create(tokens[:refresh_token]))
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token digest stored successfully"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  pp tokens
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  response_data = {
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    user: user_response(user),
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    access_token: tokens[:access_token],
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    refresh_token: tokens[:refresh_token]
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  pp response_data
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Registration response prepared - User ID: #{response_data[:user][:id]}, Email: #{response_data[:user][:email]}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Response includes access_token: #{response_data[:access_token].present?}, refresh_token: #{response_data[:refresh_token].present?}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  render json: response_data, status: :created
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] User save failed: #{user.errors.full_messages}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  pp user.errors.full_messages
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: user.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Registration exception: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join(', ')}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Registration failed' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51.

              def login
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                email = params[:email]&.downcase
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Login attempt for email: #{email}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Password provided: #{params[:password].present?}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                user = User.find_by(email: email)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User found: #{user.present?}"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                if user
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User exists (ID: #{user.id}), attempting authentication..."
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  auth_result = user.authenticate(params[:password])
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Authentication result: #{auth_result.present?}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] No user found with email: #{email}"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                if user&.authenticate(params[:password])
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Authentication successful, generating tokens..."
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  tokens = JwtService.generate_token_pair(user.id)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Tokens generated - AccessToken length: #{tokens[:access_token].length}, RefreshToken length: #{tokens[:refresh_token].length}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Updating user with refresh token digest..."
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  user.update!(refresh_token_digest: BCrypt::Password.create(tokens[:refresh_token]))
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token digest stored successfully"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  response_data = {
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    user: user_response(user),
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    access_token: tokens[:access_token],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    refresh_token: tokens[:refresh_token]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Login response prepared - User ID: #{response_data[:user][:id]}, Email: #{response_data[:user][:email]}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Response includes access_token: #{response_data[:access_token].present?}, refresh_token: #{response_data[:refresh_token].present?}"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  render json: response_data
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                else
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Login failed - invalid credentials for email: #{email}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Invalid email or password' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Login exception: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join(', ')}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Login failed' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      96.

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Comprehensive test coverage with happy/sad paths
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def refresh
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Token refresh attempt"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token provided: #{params[:refresh_token].present?}"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                begin
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Decoding refresh token..."
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  refresh_payload = JwtService.decode_token(params[:refresh_token])
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Token decoded successfully, type: #{refresh_payload['type']}, user_id: #{refresh_payload['user_id']}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  unless refresh_payload['type'] == 'refresh'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Invalid token type: #{refresh_payload['type']}"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: 'Invalid token type' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Finding user with ID: #{refresh_payload['user_id']}"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  user = User.find(refresh_payload['user_id'])
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User found: #{user.email}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # Verify the refresh token matches what we have stored
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Verifying refresh token against stored digest..."
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  token_valid = user.refresh_token_digest && BCrypt::Password.new(user.refresh_token_digest) == params[:refresh_token]
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Token verification result: #{token_valid}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  unless token_valid
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token verification failed for user: #{user.email}"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: 'Invalid refresh token' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Generating new token pair..."
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  tokens = JwtService.generate_token_pair(user.id)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] New tokens generated - AccessToken length: #{tokens[:access_token].length}, RefreshToken length: #{tokens[:refresh_token].length}"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Updating refresh token digest..."
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  user.update!(refresh_token_digest: BCrypt::Password.create(tokens[:refresh_token]))
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token digest updated successfully"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  response_data = {
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    access_token: tokens[:access_token],
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    refresh_token: tokens[:refresh_token]
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh response prepared - includes access_token: #{response_data[:access_token].present?}, refresh_token: #{response_data[:refresh_token].present?}"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  render json: response_data
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Token refresh exception: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join(', ')}"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Token refresh failed' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Comprehensive test coverage with happy/sad paths
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              def logout
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Logout attempt"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Current user present: #{current_user.present?}"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                if current_user
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Logging out user: #{current_user.email} (ID: #{current_user.id})"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Clearing refresh token digest..."
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  current_user.update!(refresh_token_digest: nil)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Refresh token digest cleared successfully"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  render json: { message: 'Logged out successfully' }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "❌ [RAILS_AUTH] Logout attempt without authenticated user"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Not logged in' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              private
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170.

              def user_params
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                params.require(:user).permit(:email, :password, :password_confirmation)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174.

              def user_response(user)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] Building user response for ID: #{user.id}, Email: #{user.email}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User created_at: #{user.created_at}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                response = {
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  id: user.id,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  email: user.email,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  created_at: user.created_at.iso8601,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  interests: user.interests || []
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔐 [RAILS_AUTH] User response built: #{response.inspect}"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                response
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            end
          
      189.

            class Api::BaseController < ApplicationController

              skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!, raise: false

    4. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_api_request!
          
      5.

              # Authentication for all API endpoints
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def authenticate_api_request!
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "=== API AUTHENTICATION DEBUG ==="
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Request path: #{request.path}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Request method: #{request.method}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Authorization header: #{request.headers['Authorization']}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "All headers: #{request.headers.to_h.select { |k,v| k.downcase.include?('auth') }}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Skip authentication in development/test if bypass flag is set
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if (Rails.env.development? || Rails.env.test?) && ENV['DEV_SKIP_AUTH'] == 'true'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Skipping auth due to DEV_SKIP_AUTH flag"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Set a default user for tests - use the first user or create one
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  @current_user = User.first || User.create!(
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    email: 'test@example.com', 
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    password: 'password123',
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    admin: false
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  )
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  return 
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                token = extract_token_from_header
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Extracted token: #{token ? '[PRESENT]' : '[MISSING]'}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                unless token
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "No token found, rendering unauthorized"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  return render_unauthorized('Missing authorization token')
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                begin
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  decoded_token = JwtService.decode_token(token)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Decoded token: #{decoded_token.inspect}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  unless decoded_token['type'] == 'access'
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Invalid token type: #{decoded_token['type']}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    return render_unauthorized('Invalid token type')
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  user_id = decoded_token['user_id']
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Looking up user with ID: #{user_id}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  @current_user = User.find_by(id: user_id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  unless @current_user
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "User not found with ID: #{user_id}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    return render_unauthorized('User not found')
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Authentication successful for user: #{@current_user.email}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Authentication failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  render_unauthorized('Invalid or expired token')
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              def current_user
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                @current_user
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66.

              def render_unauthorized(message = 'Unauthorized')
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                render json: { 
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  message: message, 
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  code: 'UNAUTHORIZED',
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  details: {}
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                }, status: :unauthorized
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def extract_token_from_header
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                authorization_header = request.headers['Authorization']
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                return nil unless authorization_header
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Extract token from "Bearer <token>" format
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                authorization_header.split(' ').last if authorization_header.start_with?('Bearer ')
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            end
          
      82.

    app/controllers/api/device_logs_controller.rb

            class Api::DeviceLogsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # POST /api/device_logs/presigned_url
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def presigned_url
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                expires_in = params[:expires_in] || 3600
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                content_type = params[:content_type] || 'text/plain'
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Generate unique key for the log file
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                timestamp = Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                device_id = params[:device_id] || 'unknown'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                log_type = params[:log_type] || 'manual'
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                key = "device_logs/user_#{current_user.id}/#{device_id}/#{log_type}_#{timestamp}_#{SecureRandom.hex(4)}.log"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Generate presigned URL for upload
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                s3 = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  region: ENV['AWS_REGION'] || 'us-east-1',
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  access_key_id: ENV['AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'],
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  secret_access_key: ENV['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                )
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                bucket = ENV['S3_USER_CONTENT_BUCKET'] || 'inkra-user-content'
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                signer = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                presigned_url = signer.presigned_url(
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  :put_object,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  bucket: bucket,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  key: key,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  expires_in: expires_in.to_i,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  content_type: content_type
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                )
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Create DeviceLog record
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                device_log = current_user.device_logs.create!(
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  s3_url: "s3://#{bucket}/#{key}",
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  device_id: device_id,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  build_version: params[:build_version],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  os_version: params[:os_version],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  log_type: log_type
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                )
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  upload_url: presigned_url,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  log_id: device_log.id,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  s3_key: key,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  expires_at: Time.current + expires_in.to_i.seconds
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to generate presigned URL: #{e.message}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Failed to generate upload URL' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53.

              # POST /api/device_logs/:id/confirm_upload
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def confirm_upload
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                device_log = current_user.device_logs.find(params[:id])
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                device_log.update!(uploaded_at: Time.current)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                render json: { success: true, log_id: device_log.id }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Log not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62.

              # GET /api/device_logs

              def index

    69.

                  {

              # GET /api/device_logs/:id/download_url
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def download_url
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                device_log = current_user.device_logs.find(params[:id])
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                presigned_url = device_log.send(:presigned_url, expires_in: 3600)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if presigned_url
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  render json: { download_url: presigned_url, expires_in: 3600 }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                else
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to generate download URL' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Log not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            end
          
      98.

              # Export podcast audio - start background job to stitch audio segments
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              def podcast
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Check if project has any audio segments
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                audio_segments = @project.audio_segments.where.not(audio_file_key: nil)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                if audio_segments.empty?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  render json: { 
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    error: "No audio segments available for podcast export",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    message: "This project doesn't have any recorded audio to export."
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  return
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                # Start background job to create the podcast
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                job_id = PodcastExportJob.perform_async(@project.id, current_user.id)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  job_id: job_id,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  message: "Podcast export started. This may take a few minutes to process.",
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  total_segments: audio_segments.count,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  estimated_duration: format_duration(audio_segments.sum(:duration_seconds))
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      97.
