                    csv << ['Chapter', 'Section', 'Content', 'Type']
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            

                  end
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            

                  
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            

            

                  # Use the structured outline data if available
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            

            

                  if export_data[:outline].any?
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            

            

                    export_data[:outline].each do |chapter|
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            

            

                      next if chapter[:omitted]
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            

            

                      
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            

            

                      chapter[:sections].each do |section|
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            

            

                        next if section[:omitted]
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            

            

                        
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            

            

                        section[:questions].each do |question|
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            

            

                          next if question[:omitted]
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            

            

                          
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            

            

                          # Combine all audio segments for this question
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            

            

                          answer_text = question[:audio_segments]
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            

            

                            .select { |seg| seg[:transcription_text].present? }
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            

            

                            .map { |seg| seg[:transcription_text] }
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            

            

                            .join(' ')
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            

            

                          
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            

            

                          if export_data[:include_questions]
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            

            

                            csv << [
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            

            

                              chapter[:title],
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            

            

                              section[:title],

                      end

                    end
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            

            

                  elsif export_data[:transcript].any?
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            

            

                    # Use transcript structure
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            

            

                    current_chapter = nil
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            

            

                    current_section = nil
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            

            

                    
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            

            

                    export_data[:transcript].each do |item|
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            

            

                      case item['type']
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            

            

                      when 'chapter'

    652. 
            

            

                        current_chapter = item['title']
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            

            

                      when 'section'
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            

            

                        current_section = item['title']
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655.

    656. 
            

            

                        if item['text'].present?
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            

                          if export_data[:include_questions] && item['question_id'].present?
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            

                            question_text = find_question_text(export_data[:outline], item['question_id'])
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            

                            csv << [
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            

                              current_chapter || '',
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            

                              current_section || '',
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            

                              question_text || '',
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            

                              item['text'],
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664.

      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665.

      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            

            

                          else
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            

            

                            csv << [
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            

            

                              current_chapter || '',

    669.

                          end

                      end

                    end

                    # Fallback to raw text if available

              end

              def find_question_text(outline, question_id)
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            

                outline.each do |chapter|
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            

                  chapter[:sections].each do |section|
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            

                    section[:questions].each do |question|
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            

                      return question[:text] if question[:question_id] == question_id
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            

                    end
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            

                  end
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            

                end
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            

                nil
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            

              end
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            

            
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            

              def generate_project_filename(format, export_data)
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            

                # Start with first 15 characters of project title
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            

                title_part = @project.title.parameterize.underscore
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            

                title_part = title_part[0..14] if title_part.length > 15  # Limit to first 15 characters
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            

                
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            

                # Add date for uniqueness
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            

                date_part = Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            

                
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            

                "#{title_part}_#{date_part}.#{format}"
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            

              end
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

            end
          
      709.

              def create

    6. 
            

            

                
          
      7.

            class Api::InterviewPresetsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_request!

              1
            

            

              before_action :set_interview_preset, only: [:show, :mark_as_shown, :launch]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4.

              # GET /api/interview_presets
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Get presets that haven't been shown to this user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              5
            

            

                excluded_ids = @current_user.user_shown_interview_presets.pluck(:interview_preset_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              5
            

            

                available_presets = InterviewPreset.active
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                                                 .where.not(id: excluded_ids)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                                 .ordered
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                                 .limit(50)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # If we have fewer than 2 available presets, reset the shown list and get fresh ones
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              5
            

            

                if available_presets.count < 2 && @current_user.user_shown_interview_presets.count > 0
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            

                  @current_user.user_shown_interview_presets.destroy_all
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              1
            

            

                  available_presets = InterviewPreset.active.ordered.limit(50)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Select 2 random presets for the home screen
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              5
            

            

                selected_presets = available_presets.order(Arel.sql('RANDOM()')).limit(2)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              5
            

            

                render json: {

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      32.

                }

              def show

                render json: {

                  preset: {

                    uuid: @interview_preset.uuid,

                    total_questions_count: @interview_preset.total_questions_count,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    is_featured: @interview_preset.is_featured,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    questions_by_chapter: @interview_preset.questions_grouped_by_chapter.transform_values do |questions|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              2
            

            

                      questions.map do |q|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        {
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              3
            

            

                          id: q.id,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                          text: q.question_text,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                          chapter_title: q.chapter_title,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                          section_title: q.section_title,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                          order: [q.chapter_order, q.section_order, q.question_order]
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                        }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      end
          
      59.

                    end

                  }

                }

              def categories

              def featured

              def set_interview_preset
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              8
            

            

                @interview_preset = InterviewPreset.find_by!(uuid: params[:uuid])

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140.

              def create_project_structure(project)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              3
            

            

                questions_by_chapter = @interview_preset.questions_grouped_by_chapter
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              3
            

            

                questions_by_chapter.each do |chapter_title, questions|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              3
            

            

                  chapter = project.chapters.create!(
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    title: chapter_title,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    order: questions.first.chapter_order,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    omitted: false
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  )
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  # Group questions by section within this chapter
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              3
            

            

                  questions_by_section = questions.group_by(&:section_title)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              3
            

            

                  questions_by_section.each do |section_title, section_questions|
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              3
            

            

                    section = chapter.sections.create!(
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      title: section_title,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      order: section_questions.first.section_order,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      omitted: false
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    )
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    # Create questions in this section
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              3
            

            

                    section_questions.each do |preset_question|
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              6
            

            

                      section.questions.create!(
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                        text: preset_question.question_text,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                        order: preset_question.question_order,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        omitted: false,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        skipped: false
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      )
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            end

            class Api::InterviewQuestionsController < Api::BaseController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # Generate a complete interview outline
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def generate_outline
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] generate_outline called with params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                topic = params[:topic]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                options = {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  num_chapters: params[:num_chapters]&.to_i || 3,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  sections_per_chapter: params[:sections_per_chapter]&.to_i || 2,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  questions_per_section: params[:questions_per_section]&.to_i || 3
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Parsed options: #{options.inspect}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                if topic.blank?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Topic is blank, returning bad_request"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Topic is required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  return
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                begin
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Creating InterviewQuestionService instance"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Calling generate_interview_outline with topic: #{topic}, options: #{options}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  outline = service.generate_interview_outline(topic, options)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Outline generated: #{outline.keys.inspect}, chapters count: #{outline[:chapters]&.size || 0}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  if outline[:error]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Outline generation error: #{outline[:error]}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: outline[:error] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    response_data = {
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      outline: outline,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Successful outline generation, returning: #{response_data.keys.inspect}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    render json: response_data
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Interview outline generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to generate interview outline' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # Generate additional questions for a section
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def generate_section_questions
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] generate_section_questions called with params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                section_id = params[:section_id]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                num_questions = params[:num_questions]&.to_i || 3
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Looking for section_id: #{section_id}, num_questions: #{num_questions}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                section = current_user.projects.joins(:sections).find_by(sections: { id: section_id })&.sections&.find(section_id)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                unless section
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Section not found for id: #{section_id}, user: #{current_user.id}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Section not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  return
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Found section: #{section.title}, chapter: #{section.chapter.title}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  section_context = {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    chapter_title: section.chapter.title,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    section_title: section.title,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    existing_questions: section.questions.by_order.pluck(:text)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Section context: #{section_context.inspect}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Generating #{num_questions} new questions"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  new_questions = service.generate_section_questions(section_context, num_questions)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Generated #{new_questions.size} questions"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  response_data = {
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    section_id: section.id,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    new_questions: new_questions,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Returning new questions for section #{section_id}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  render json: response_data
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Section questions generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to generate section questions' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              # Refine existing questions based on feedback
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              def refine_questions
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                question_ids = params[:question_ids] || []
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                feedback = params[:feedback]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                if question_ids.empty? || feedback.blank?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Question IDs and feedback are required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  return
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                questions = current_user.projects.joins(:questions).where(questions: { id: question_ids }).distinct.flat_map(&:questions).select { |q| question_ids.include?(q.id) }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                if questions.empty?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'No questions found' }, status: :not_found
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  return
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                begin
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  questions_data = questions.map { |q| { text: q.text, id: q.id } }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  refined_questions = service.refine_questions(questions_data, feedback)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    original_questions: questions_data,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    refined_questions: refined_questions,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    feedback_applied: feedback,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  }
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Question refinement failed: #{e.message}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to refine questions' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              # Create project from generated outline
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def create_project_from_outline
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] create_project_from_outline called"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                project_title = params[:title]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                topic = params[:topic]
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                outline_data = params[:outline]
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Project params - title: #{project_title}, topic: #{topic}, outline keys: #{outline_data&.keys&.inspect}"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                if project_title.blank? || topic.blank? || outline_data.blank?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Missing required params - title: #{project_title.present?}, topic: #{topic.present?}, outline: #{outline_data.present?}"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Title, topic, and outline are required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  return
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                begin
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Starting transaction to create project"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    # Create the project
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    project = current_user.projects.create!(
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      title: project_title,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      topic: topic,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      status: 'outline_ready'
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    )
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Created project id: #{project.id}, title: #{project.title}"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    # Create chapters, sections, and questions from outline
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    chapters_count = outline_data[:chapters]&.size || 0
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Creating #{chapters_count} chapters"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    outline_data[:chapters]&.each do |chapter_data|
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      chapter = project.chapters.create!(
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        title: chapter_data[:title],
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        order: chapter_data[:order],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                        omitted: false
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                      )
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Created chapter id: #{chapter.id}, title: #{chapter.title}, order: #{chapter.order}"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      sections_count = chapter_data[:sections]&.size || 0
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Creating #{sections_count} sections for chapter #{chapter.id}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      chapter_data[:sections]&.each do |section_data|
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                        section = chapter.sections.create!(
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                          title: section_data[:title],
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                          order: section_data[:order],
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                          omitted: false
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                        )
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Created section id: #{section.id}, title: #{section.title}, order: #{section.order}"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        questions_count = section_data[:questions]&.size || 0
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Creating #{questions_count} questions for section #{section.id}"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                        
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                        section_data[:questions]&.each do |question_data|
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                          question = section.questions.create!(
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                            text: question_data[:text],
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                            order: question_data[:order]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                          )
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Created question id: #{question.id}, order: #{question.order}"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                        end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Project creation complete - total questions: #{project.questions.count}"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      project_id: project.id,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      title: project.title,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                      status: project.status,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      created_at: project.created_at.iso8601,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      message: 'Project created successfully from generated outline'
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    }, status: :created
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Project creation from outline failed: #{e.message}"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Error class: #{e.class.name}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to create project from outline' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              # Generate interview from tracker data
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def generate_from_tracker
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] generate_from_tracker called with params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                tracker_name = params[:tracker_name]
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                tracker_context = params[:tracker_context]
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Tracker: #{tracker_name}, context keys: #{tracker_context&.keys&.inspect if tracker_context.is_a?(Hash)}"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                if tracker_name.blank? || tracker_context.blank?
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Missing tracker params - name: #{tracker_name.present?}, context: #{tracker_context.present?}"
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Tracker name and context are required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  return
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                begin
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Creating InterviewQuestionService for tracker generation"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Calling generate_interview_from_tracker"
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  outline = service.generate_interview_from_tracker(tracker_name, tracker_context)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Tracker outline generated, keys: #{outline.keys.inspect}"
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  if outline[:error]
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Tracker generation error: #{outline[:error]}"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: outline[:error] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  else
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    response_data = {
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      outline: outline,
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      tracker_name: tracker_name,
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                      generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    }
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Successful tracker interview generation"
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    render json: response_data
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Tracker interview generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[INTERVIEW_DEBUG] Backtrace: #{e.backtrace.first(5).join('\n')}"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to generate interview from tracker data' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              # Add generated questions to existing section
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              def add_questions_to_section
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                section_id = params[:section_id]
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                questions_data = params[:questions] || []
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                section = current_user.projects.joins(:sections).find_by(sections: { id: section_id })&.sections&.find(section_id)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                unless section
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Section not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  return
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                if questions_data.empty?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Questions data is required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  return
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

            
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                begin
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    max_order = section.questions.maximum(:order) || 0
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    new_questions = questions_data.map.with_index do |question_data, index|
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                      section.questions.create!(
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                        text: question_data[:text],
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                        order: max_order + index + 1
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      )
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                      section_id: section.id,
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      added_questions: new_questions.map do |q|
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                        {
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                          question_id: q.id,
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                          text: q.text,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                          order: q.order
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                        }
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                      end,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      message: "#{new_questions.count} questions added successfully"
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    }
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Adding questions to section failed: #{e.message}"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Failed to add questions to section' }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            end
          
      284.

              # Generate Polly audio for all questions in a project
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def generate_all
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                tracker = PerformanceTracker.instance
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                session_id = "api_generate_all_#{@project&.id || 'unknown'}_#{Time.current.to_i}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                tracker.start_session(session_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                unless @project.is_speech_interview
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  tracker.track_event('validation_failed', { reason: 'not_speech_interview' })
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  render json: { 
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    error: 'Project is not configured for speech interviews' 
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  return
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                voice_id = params[:voice_id] || 'Matthew'
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                speech_rate = params[:speech_rate]&.to_i || 100
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Update project with voice settings
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                tracker.track_event('update_project_settings', { voice_id: voice_id, speech_rate: speech_rate }) do
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  @project.update(voice_id: voice_id, speech_rate: speech_rate)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                begin
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  result = tracker.track_event('polly_generation_service', { 
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id, 
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id, 
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    speech_rate: speech_rate 
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  }) do
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    service = PollyAudioGenerationService.new(@project, voice_id: voice_id, speech_rate: speech_rate)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    service.generate_all_question_audio
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  tracker.end_session
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    speech_rate: speech_rate,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601,

              # Update voice settings and regenerate audio as needed

      105.

                voice_id = params[:voice_id]

    115.

      116.

              # Get generation status for a project
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def status
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                unless @project.is_speech_interview
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  render json: { 
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    error: 'Project is not configured for speech interviews' 
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  return
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                begin
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  service = PollyAudioGenerationService.new(@project)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  status_info = service.generation_status
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  cost_estimate = service.estimate_cost
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    status: status_info,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    cost_estimate: cost_estimate,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    checked_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      162.

      169.
