    170. 
            

            

              # Generate audio for specific questions
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              def generate_questions
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                question_ids = params[:question_ids] || []
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                voice_id = params[:voice_id] || 'Matthew'
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                speech_rate = params[:speech_rate]&.to_i || 100
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                if question_ids.empty?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Question IDs are required' }, status: :bad_request
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  return
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # Verify user has access to all questions
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                user_question_ids = current_user.projects.joins(:questions).where(questions: { id: question_ids }).pluck('questions.id')
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                if user_question_ids.length != question_ids.length
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Some questions not found or access denied' }, status: :forbidden
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  return
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                begin
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  results = PollyAudioGenerationService.batch_generate(question_ids, voice_id: voice_id, speech_rate: speech_rate)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  success_count = results.count { |r| r[:status] == 'success' }
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  error_count = results.count { |r| r[:status] == 'error' }
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    speech_rate: speech_rate,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    results: results,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    summary: {
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      total: results.length,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      success: success_count,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      errors: error_count
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    },
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  }
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Batch audio generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      207.

                  render json: { error: "Failed to generate audio: #{e.message}" }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      208.

      209.

              # List available Polly voices

              def voices

              # Clean up failed audio clips

              def cleanup_failed
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                unless @project.is_speech_interview

                begin

                rescue => e

      249.

              def set_project
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                unless current_user.present?
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  return render json: { 
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    requested_project_id: params[:id],
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262.

      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263.

      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264.

      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                @project = current_user.projects.find(params[:id])
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      268.

            class Api::PollyVoicesController < Api::BaseController

              # Make the index action publicly accessible (no authentication required)

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                begin
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  polly_service = Aws::PollyService.new # No user needed for listing voices
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  voices = polly_service.list_english_voices.map do |voice|
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                      id: voice[:id],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                      name: voice[:name],
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                      gender: voice[:gender],
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      neural: voice[:neural],
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      language_code: voice[:language_code],
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      demo_url: "https://#{ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET']}.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/inkra_voice_welcomes/#{voice[:id].downcase}_inkra_welcome.mp3"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    voices: voices,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    default_voice_id: Aws::PollyService::DEFAULT_VOICE,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

      24.

                  }

              def generate_demo
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                voice_id = params[:id]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                service = Aws::PollyService.new # Use the main PollyService
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Find the voice configuration in ENGLISH_VOICES
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                voice_config = Aws::PollyService::ENGLISH_VOICES.find { |v| v[:id] == voice_id }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                unless voice_config
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  return render_not_found("Voice with ID '#{voice_id}' not found in English voices list.")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🎤 Generating demo for voice: #{voice_id}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                begin
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # Use a standard demo phrase
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  demo_text = "Hi there! This is a sample of my voice. I can help bring your story to life with natural, expressive narration."
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Pass the correct engine type (neural or standard)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  engine_type = voice_config[:neural] ? 'neural' : 'standard'
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  result = service.generate_speech(
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    text: demo_text,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    speech_rate: 100, # Default demo rate
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    language_code: voice_config[:language_code], # Use correct language code from config
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    engine: engine_type # Ensure the correct engine is passed
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  )
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  s3_key = result[:s3_key]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  demo_url = service.get_presigned_url(s3_key) # Generate presigned URL for playback
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🎤 Demo generated for #{voice_id}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  render json: { demo_url: demo_url }, status: :ok
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                rescue Aws::Polly::Errors::ServiceError => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Polly service error generating demo for #{voice_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  render_error("Polly service error: #{e.message}", "POLLY_SERVICE_ERROR", :bad_request)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "🚨 Failed to generate demo for #{voice_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  render_error("Failed to generate demo clip. Error: #{e.message}", "DEMO_GENERATION_FAILED", :internal_server_error)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            end
          
      73.

    app/controllers/api/projects_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    1018 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 1018 lines missed.

            class Api::ProjectsController < Api::BaseController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              include ErrorResponder
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_project, except: [:index, :recent, :create]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Comprehensive test coverage with happy/sad paths
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Optimize with eager loading and single query with aggregations (presets removed)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                projects = current_user.projects
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                                      .left_joins(:chapters, :sections, :questions)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                      .select('projects.*, 
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT chapters.id) as chapters_count,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT sections.id) as sections_count,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT questions.id) as questions_count,
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN questions.is_follow_up = false THEN questions.id END) as base_questions_count,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN questions.is_follow_up = true THEN questions.id END) as followup_questions_count')
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                      .group('projects.id')
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                      .order('last_accessed_at DESC NULLS LAST, last_modified_at DESC')
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Get answered questions count for all projects in a single query
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                answered_counts = AudioSegment
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  .where(project_id: projects.map(&:id))
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  .where.not(question_id: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  .group(:project_id)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  .distinct
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  .count(:question_id)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  projects: projects.map do |project|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    # Calculate outline status without additional queries
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    outline_status = case project.status
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                                    when 'outline_generating'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                                      'generating'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                    when 'failed'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                                      'failed'
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                                    else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                                      project.chapters_count > 0 ? 'ready' : 'not_started'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    {
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      id: project.id,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      title: project.title,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      topic: project.topic,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      created_at: project.created_at.iso8601,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      last_modified_at: project.last_modified_at.iso8601,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      last_accessed_at: project.last_accessed_at&.iso8601,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      is_speech_interview: project.is_speech_interview,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      outline: {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        status: outline_status,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        chapters_count: project.chapters_count,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        sections_count: project.sections_count,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        questions_count: project.questions_count,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        base_questions_count: project.base_questions_count || 0,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        followup_questions_count: project.followup_questions_count || 0,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        answered_questions_count: answered_counts[project.id] || 0
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Batch endpoint for recent projects
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def recent
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                limit = params[:limit]&.to_i || 5
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                offset = params[:offset]&.to_i || 0
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Get recent projects with counts, limited by parameters
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                projects = current_user.projects
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                                      .left_joins(:chapters, :sections, :questions)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                                      .select('projects.*, 
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT chapters.id) as chapters_count,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT sections.id) as sections_count,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT questions.id) as questions_count,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN questions.is_follow_up = false THEN questions.id END) as base_questions_count,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                                              COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN questions.is_follow_up = true THEN questions.id END) as followup_questions_count')
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                                      .group('projects.id')
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                                      .order('last_accessed_at DESC NULLS LAST, last_modified_at DESC')
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                                      .limit(limit)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                                      .offset(offset)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                # Get total count for pagination
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                total_count = current_user.projects.count
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                has_more = offset + limit < total_count
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # Get answered questions count for these projects
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                answered_counts = AudioSegment
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  .where(project_id: projects.map(&:id))
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  .where.not(question_id: nil)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  .group(:project_id)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  .distinct
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  .count(:question_id)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  projects: projects.map do |project|
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    outline_status = case project.status
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                                    when 'outline_generating'
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                                      'generating'
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                                    when 'failed'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                                      'failed'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                                    else
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                                      project.chapters_count > 0 ? 'ready' : 'not_started'
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    {
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      id: project.id,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      title: project.title,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      topic: project.topic,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      created_at: project.created_at.iso8601,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      last_modified_at: project.last_modified_at.iso8601,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      last_accessed_at: project.last_accessed_at&.iso8601,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      is_speech_interview: project.is_speech_interview,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      outline: {
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        status: outline_status,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        chapters_count: project.chapters_count,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        sections_count: project.sections_count,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        questions_count: project.questions_count,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                        base_questions_count: project.base_questions_count || 0,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                        followup_questions_count: project.followup_questions_count || 0,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                        answered_questions_count: answered_counts[project.id] || 0
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    }
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  end,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  pagination: {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    total_count: total_count,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    has_more: has_more,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    current_offset: offset,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    current_limit: limit
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                }
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              # Test Harness Status: ✅ Comprehensive test coverage with happy/sad paths
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              def create
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "=== PROJECT CREATE DEBUG ==="
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Raw params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Processed project_params: #{project_params.inspect}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # Implement retry logic with exponential backoff for race conditions
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                max_retries = 3
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                retry_count = 0
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                begin
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  retry_count += 1
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  project = current_user.projects.new(project_params)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    # Check for duplicate projects within the transaction to avoid race conditions
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    topic = project_params[:topic]
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    if topic.present?
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      # Use advisory lock based on user_id + topic hash to prevent race conditions
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      topic_hash = Digest::SHA256.hexdigest("#{current_user.id}_#{topic}").to_i(16) % 2147483647
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Acquiring advisory lock for user #{current_user.id}, topic: '#{topic}' (hash: #{topic_hash})"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      # Get advisory lock - this will block other requests with same user+topic combination
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                      ActiveRecord::Base.connection.execute("SELECT pg_advisory_xact_lock(#{topic_hash})")
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      # Now check for duplicates after acquiring the lock
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      recent_duplicate = current_user.projects
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                                                    .where("created_at > ? AND topic = ?", 10.seconds.ago, topic)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                                                    .first
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      if recent_duplicate
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Duplicate project creation detected for topic '#{topic}' - returning existing project #{recent_duplicate.id}"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                        return render json: {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                          project_id: recent_duplicate.id,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                          title: recent_duplicate.title,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                          created_at: recent_duplicate.created_at.iso8601,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                          duplicate_prevented: true
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        }, status: :created
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    # Preset functionality disabled - use custom topic only
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    if project.title.blank? && project.topic.present?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      # If only topic is provided (from initial_topic), use it as both title and topic
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      project.title = project.topic
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    elsif project.topic.blank?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      project.topic = "Custom Interview" # Default fallback
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      project.title = project.topic if project.title.blank?
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    project.status = 'outline_generating' # Initial status before scaffolding
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    project.save!
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    # CRITICAL FIX: Make outline generation asynchronous to avoid 20+ second API response times
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    # Queue a background job to generate the outline instead of doing it synchronously
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Enqueuing async outline generation job for project #{project.id}"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    OutlineGenerationJob.perform_later(project.id)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  # NOTE: Polly jobs will be enqueued by the OutlineGenerationJob after questions are created
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    project_id: project.id,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    title: project.title,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    created_at: project.created_at.iso8601
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  }, status: :created
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  render_error(e.record.errors.full_messages.join(", "), "VALIDATION_ERROR", :unprocessable_entity, { field_errors: e.record.errors.as_json })
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                rescue PG::TRSerializationFailure, ActiveRecord::Deadlocked => e
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  if retry_count < max_retries
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Transaction conflict on project creation attempt #{retry_count}, retrying... (#{e.class}: #{e.message})"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    sleep(0.1 * retry_count) # Exponential backoff: 0.1s, 0.2s, 0.3s
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    retry
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  else
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to create project after #{max_retries} retries due to transaction conflicts"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    render_error("Project creation failed due to high concurrency. Please try again.", "CREATION_CONFLICT", :service_unavailable)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Unexpected error in project creation: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  render_error("An unexpected error occurred during project creation", "INTERNAL_ERROR", :internal_server_error)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              def show
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                # Touch last accessed timestamp
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                @project.touch_accessed
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                # Use a single optimized query to load all associations including follow_up_questions
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                project_with_details = current_user.projects
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  .includes(
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    chapters: { 
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      sections: {
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                        questions: :follow_up_questions
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      }
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  )
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  .where(id: @project.id)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  .first
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                render json: project_json_representation(project_with_details)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def update
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "=== PROJECT UPDATE DEBUG ==="
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Project ID: #{@project.id}"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Update params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                if params[:status]
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  valid_statuses = ['outline_ready', 'recording_in_progress', 'transcribing', 'completed']
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  unless valid_statuses.include?(params[:status])
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                    return render_error(
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                      "Invalid status: #{params[:status]}",
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                      "INVALID_STATUS",
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                      :bad_request
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    )
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  @project.update!(
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                    status: params[:status],
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                    last_modified_at: Time.current
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  )
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                # FIX: Eager load associations and render the full project object
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                # to match the Swift client's expectation.
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                project_with_details = current_user.projects
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  .includes(
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    chapters: { 
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                      sections: {
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                        questions: :follow_up_questions
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      }
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    }
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  )
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  .find(@project.id)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                render json: project_json_representation(project_with_details)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Project update failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                render_error(
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  "Failed to update project: #{e.message}",
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  "UPDATE_ERROR",
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  :internal_server_error
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                )
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

              end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              def outline
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                updates = params[:updates] || []
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                updates.each do |update|
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  if update[:chapter_id]
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                    chapter = @project.chapters.find(update[:chapter_id])
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                    chapter.update(omitted: update[:omitted]) if chapter
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  elsif update[:section_id]
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                    section = @project.sections.find(update[:section_id])
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    section.update(omitted: update[:omitted]) if section
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                  elsif update[:question_id]
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                    question = @project.questions.find(update[:question_id])
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    question.update(omitted: update[:omitted]) if question
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                end
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                @project.update(last_modified_at: Time.current)
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  message: 'Outline updated successfully',
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  project_id: @project.id,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  status: @project.status
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                }
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

              end
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

              def transcript
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                if request.patch?
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  update_transcript
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                else
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  show_transcript
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

              end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

              private
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

              def show_transcript
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                transcript = @project.transcript
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                # Create a placeholder transcript if it doesn't exist
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                unless transcript
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                  transcript = @project.build_transcript
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  transcript.status = 'processing_raw'
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  transcript.save!
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                end
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  id: transcript.id,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  project_id: @project.id,
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  status: transcript.status,
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  last_updated: transcript.last_updated&.iso8601,
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                  raw_content: transcript.raw_content,
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                  polished_content: transcript.polished_content,
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                  edited_content: transcript.edited_content_json || [],
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                  raw_structured_content: transcript.raw_structured_content_json || []
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                }
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

              end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

              def update_transcript
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                transcript = @project.transcript
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                unless transcript
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                  render_error("Transcript not found", "TRANSCRIPT_NOT_FOUND", :not_found)
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                  return
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                end
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                # Extract polished content from request
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                polished_content = params[:polishedContent]
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                edited_content = params[:editedContent]
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                begin
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                  # Update transcript
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                    polished_content: polished_content,
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                    edited_content_json: edited_content,
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                    last_updated: Time.current
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                  )
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                  
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                  # Update project's last modified timestamp
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                  @project.update!(last_modified_at: Time.current)
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                  
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Transcript updated for project #{@project.id}"
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                  
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                    id: transcript.id,
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                    project_id: @project.id,
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                    status: transcript.status,
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                    last_updated: transcript.last_updated.iso8601,
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                    message: "Transcript updated successfully"
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                  }
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                  
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to update transcript for project #{@project.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                  render_error("Failed to update transcript", "UPDATE_FAILED", :unprocessable_entity)
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                end
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

              end
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

            
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

              public
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

            
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

              def add_more_chapters
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "=== ADD_MORE_CHAPTERS DEBUG ==="
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Project ID: #{@project.id}"
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Project topic: #{@project.topic}"
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Current chapters count: #{@project.chapters.count}"
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                begin
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                  # Use LLM service to generate additional chapters
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "InterviewQuestionService instantiated"
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                  
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                  additional_outline = service.generate_additional_chapters(@project)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389.
