      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                if status.success? && stdout.present?
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  stdout.strip.to_f.round(2)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                else
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Could not determine audio duration: #{stderr}"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  0.0
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              def format_duration(seconds)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                return "0 seconds" if seconds.nil? || seconds == 0
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                hours = seconds / 3600
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                minutes = (seconds % 3600) / 60
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                remaining_seconds = (seconds % 60).round
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                parts = []
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                parts << "#{hours.to_i} hour#{'s' if hours != 1}" if hours >= 1
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                parts << "#{minutes.to_i} minute#{'s' if minutes != 1}" if minutes >= 1
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                parts << "#{remaining_seconds} second#{'s' if remaining_seconds != 1}" if remaining_seconds > 0 || parts.empty?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                parts.join(", ")
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              def cleanup_temp_files
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                return unless @temp_files
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                @temp_files.each do |temp_file|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    temp_file.close unless temp_file.closed?
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    temp_file.unlink if File.exist?(temp_file.path)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Failed to cleanup temp file: #{e.message}"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Cleaned up #{@temp_files.count} temporary files"
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

            end
          
      248.

    app/jobs/polly_generation_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    55 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 55 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class PollyGenerationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(question_id, voice_id: 'Joanna', speech_rate: 100)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "\n🎙️🚀 POLLY GENERATION JOB STARTED"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "━" * 50
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "🆔 Question ID: #{question_id}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "🎙️ Voice ID: #{voice_id}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "⏱️ Speech Rate: #{speech_rate}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                question = Question.find_by(id: question_id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                unless question
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "PollyGenerationJob: Question with id #{question_id} not found, skipping job"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  return
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "📝 Question Text: \"#{question.text}\""
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "📁 Section: #{question.section.title}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "📚 Chapter: #{question.section.chapter.title}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                project = question.section.chapter.project
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Skip if project is not a speech interview
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                return unless project.is_speech_interview
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # Skip if audio already exists and is completed
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                if question.polly_audio_clip&.completed?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Polly audio already exists for question #{question_id}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  return
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Create or find the polly audio clip record
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                audio_clip = question.polly_audio_clip || question.create_polly_audio_clip!(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  voice_id: voice_id,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  speech_rate: speech_rate,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  status: 'pending'
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Update status to generating
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                audio_clip.update!(status: 'generating')
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                begin
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # Generate speech using Polly service
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "🎙️ Calling AWS Polly service..."
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  polly_service = Aws::PollyService.new(project.user)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  result = polly_service.generate_speech(
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    text: question.text,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    speech_rate: speech_rate
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  )
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "🗝 Generated S3 Key: #{result[:s3_key]}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  # Update the audio clip with the S3 key
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  audio_clip.update!(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    s3_key: result[:s3_key],
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    status: 'completed'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  )
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully generated Polly audio for question #{question_id}"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "   🗝 Final S3 Key: #{audio_clip.s3_key}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "━" * 50
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ Failed to generate Polly audio for question #{question_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "━" * 50
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  audio_clip.update!(
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    status: 'failed',
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    error_message: e.message
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  )
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  raise
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            end
          
      75.

    app/jobs/transcript_editing_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    128 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 128 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class TranscriptEditingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(project_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                project = Project.find(project_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                transcript = project.transcript
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                unless transcript && (transcript.raw_content.present? || transcript.raw_structured_content.present?)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "No raw content available for project #{project_id}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  return
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting transcript editing for project #{project_id}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                begin
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Set status to editing
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(status: 'editing')
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Use raw plaintext if available, otherwise fall back to structured content
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  raw_content = transcript.raw_content.present? ? transcript.raw_content : transcript.raw_structured_content_json
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Call Gemini to polish the transcript
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  polished_content = GeminiTextPolishingService.polish_transcript(raw_content)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if polished_content.present?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Update transcript with polished content
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    transcript.update!(
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      polished_content: polished_content,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      status: 'ready',
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      last_updated: Time.current
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    )
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    # For backward compatibility, also update edited_content if using structured content
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    if transcript.raw_content.blank? && transcript.raw_structured_content.present?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      structured_polished = GeminiTextPolishingService.polish_transcript_structured(transcript.raw_structured_content_json)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      polished_content_with_ids = map_ids_to_polished_content(structured_polished, transcript.raw_structured_content_json)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      transcript.update!(edited_content_json: polished_content_with_ids)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    # Mark project as completed
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    project.update!(status: 'completed', last_modified_at: Time.current)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Transcript editing completed for project #{project_id}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    raise "Gemini polishing returned empty content"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Transcript editing failed for project #{project_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(status: 'failed') if transcript.persisted?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  project.update!(status: 'failed') if project.persisted?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              private
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def map_ids_to_polished_content(polished_content, raw_content)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                # Create lookup maps from raw content
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                chapter_map = {}
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                section_map = {}
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                question_map = {}
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                audio_segment_map = {}
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                raw_content.each do |item|
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  case item['type']
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  when 'chapter'
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    chapter_map[item['title']] = {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      id: item['chapterId'],
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      title: item['title']
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  when 'section'
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    section_map[item['title']] = {
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      id: item['sectionId'],
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      title: item['title']
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  when 'paragraph'
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    if item['questionId']
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      question_map[item['text']] = item['questionId']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    if item['audioSegmentId']
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      audio_segment_map[item['text']] = item['audioSegmentId']
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                # Map IDs to polished content
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                current_chapter_id = nil
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                current_section_id = nil
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                polished_content.map do |item|
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  case item['type']
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  when 'chapter'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    current_chapter_id = chapter_map[item['title']]&.dig(:id)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    item.merge(
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      'chapterId' => current_chapter_id
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    )
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  when 'section'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    current_section_id = section_map[item['title']]&.dig(:id)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    item.merge(
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      'sectionId' => current_section_id
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    )
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  when 'paragraph'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    # Try to find matching question and audio segment from raw content
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    best_question_id = find_best_matching_question_id(item['text'], raw_content)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    best_audio_segment_id = find_best_matching_audio_segment_id(item['text'], raw_content)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    item.merge(
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      'chapterId' => current_chapter_id,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      'sectionId' => current_section_id,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      'questionId' => best_question_id,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      'audioSegmentId' => best_audio_segment_id
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    )
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  else
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    item
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              def find_best_matching_question_id(polished_text, raw_content)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Find the raw paragraph with the highest similarity to the polished text
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                best_match = nil
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                best_score = 0
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                raw_content.each do |item|
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  next unless item['type'] == 'paragraph' && item['questionId']
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  similarity = calculate_text_similarity(polished_text, item['text'])
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  if similarity > best_score
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    best_score = similarity
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    best_match = item['questionId']
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                best_match
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def find_best_matching_audio_segment_id(polished_text, raw_content)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                # Find the raw paragraph with the highest similarity to the polished text
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                best_match = nil
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                best_score = 0
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                raw_content.each do |item|
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  next unless item['type'] == 'paragraph' && item['audioSegmentId']
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  similarity = calculate_text_similarity(polished_text, item['text'])
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  if similarity > best_score
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    best_score = similarity
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    best_match = item['audioSegmentId']
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                best_match
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def calculate_text_similarity(text1, text2)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                return 0 if text1.blank? || text2.blank?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Simple word-based similarity calculation
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                words1 = text1.downcase.split(/\W+/).reject(&:empty?)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                words2 = text2.downcase.split(/\W+/).reject(&:empty?)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                return 0 if words1.empty? || words2.empty?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                common_words = (words1 & words2).length
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                total_words = (words1 | words2).length
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                common_words.to_f / total_words
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            end
          
      171.

    app/jobs/transcription_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    33 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 33 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class TranscriptionJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(audio_segment_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting transcription job for audio segment #{audio_segment_id}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Delegate to TranscriptionService for actual processing
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                result = TranscriptionService.process_transcription(audio_segment_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if result[:success]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Transcription job completed successfully for audio segment #{audio_segment_id}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Get the audio segment and project
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  audio_segment = AudioSegment.find_by(id: audio_segment_id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  unless audio_segment
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "TranscriptionJob: AudioSegment with id #{audio_segment_id} not found during follow-up processing"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    return result
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  project = audio_segment.project
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Trigger follow-up question generation if transcription was successful
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  if audio_segment.question.present? && audio_segment.transcription_text.present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    GenerateFollowupQuestionsJob.perform_later(audio_segment_id)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Triggered follow-up question generation for audio segment #{audio_segment_id}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # Check if all audio segments for this project are now transcribed
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # Use reliable count check instead of iterating over all segments to avoid race condition
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  total_segments = project.audio_segments.count
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  transcribed_segments = project.audio_segments.where(upload_status: 'transcribed').count
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  if total_segments == transcribed_segments
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "All #{total_segments} segments transcribed for project #{project.id}, enqueuing FinalizeTranscriptJob."
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    FinalizeTranscriptJob.perform_later(project.id)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Transcription job failed for audio segment #{audio_segment_id}: #{result[:error]}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                result
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Transcription job error for audio segment #{audio_segment_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                raise e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            end
          
      47.

    app/jobs/unlimited_questions_generation_job.rb

            class UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(project_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Starting for project #{project_id}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                project = Project.find_by(id: project_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                unless project
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Project #{project_id} not found"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  return
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Only process if this is an unlimited interview
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                unless project.interview_length == 'unlimited'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Project #{project_id} is not unlimited mode, skipping"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  return
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Count total questions and answered questions
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                total_questions = project.questions.where(is_follow_up: false).count
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                answered_questions = AudioSegment
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  .where(project_id: project.id)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  .where.not(question_id: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  .distinct
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  .count(:question_id)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Project #{project_id} has #{answered_questions}/#{total_questions} questions answered"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # Check if we've reached the 2/3 threshold
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                threshold = (total_questions * 2.0 / 3.0).ceil
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                if answered_questions >= threshold
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Threshold reached (#{answered_questions} >= #{threshold}), generating more questions"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Generate additional questions
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  generate_additional_questions(project)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                else
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Threshold not reached yet (#{answered_questions} < #{threshold})"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              private
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def generate_additional_questions(project)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                begin
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Get existing questions for context
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  existing_questions = project.questions
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    .where(is_follow_up: false)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    .order(:order)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    .pluck(:text)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  # Get answered questions with their responses for better context
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  answered_segments = AudioSegment
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    .joins(:question)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    .where(project_id: project.id)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    .where.not(question_id: nil)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    .select('questions.text as question_text, audio_segments.transcript')
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  context = {
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    topic: project.topic,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    existing_questions: existing_questions,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    answered_questions: answered_segments.map { |s| { question: s.question_text, answer: s.transcript } }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Generating 20 additional questions with context"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  # Use the interview question service to generate more questions
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  service = InterviewQuestionService.new
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  new_questions_data = service.generate_additional_questions_for_unlimited(context, 20)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  if new_questions_data.present?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    # Find the last section to add questions to
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    last_section = project.sections.joins(:chapter).order('chapters.order DESC, sections.order DESC').first
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    if last_section
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      # Get the highest order number for existing questions
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      max_order = project.questions.maximum(:order) || 0
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        new_questions_data.each_with_index do |question_text, index|
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          question = last_section.questions.create!(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                            text: question_text,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                            order: max_order + index + 1,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                            is_follow_up: false
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                          )
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                          
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                          # If speech interview, generate audio
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                          if project.is_speech_interview
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                            PollyGenerationJob.perform_later(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                              question.id,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                              voice_id: project.voice_id || 'Joanna',
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                              speech_rate: project.speech_rate || 100
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                            )
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                          end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Successfully added #{new_questions_data.length} new questions to project #{project.id}"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: No section found to add questions to"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Failed to generate additional questions"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "UnlimitedQuestionsGenerationJob: Error generating questions: #{e.message}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            end

              def account_deleted(email, feedback_data = {})

                @user_email = email
          
      27.

                @feedback_data = feedback_data
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                @deletion_date = Time.current.strftime('%B %d, %Y at %I:%M %p %Z')
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                
          
      30.

              def estimated_transcription_time

              def presigned_url(expires_in: 3600)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return nil unless s3_url.present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                s3 = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  region: ENV['AWS_REGION'] || 'us-east-1',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  access_key_id: ENV['AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'],
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  secret_access_key: ENV['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                )
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                bucket, key = parse_s3_url
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                return nil unless bucket && key
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                signer = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                signer.presigned_url(:get_object, bucket: bucket, key: key, expires_in: expires_in)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to generate presigned URL: #{e.message}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                nil
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              def parse_s3_url
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                return [nil, nil] unless s3_url.present?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if s3_url.start_with?('s3://')
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  parts = s3_url.gsub('s3://', '').split('/', 2)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  [parts[0], parts[1]]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                elsif s3_url.start_with?('https://')
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  uri = URI.parse(s3_url)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  bucket = uri.host.split('.').first
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  key = uri.path[1..-1] # Remove leading slash
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  [bucket, key]
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  [nil, nil]
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            end
          
      49.

            class PollyAudioClip < ApplicationRecord

              def cleanup_sidekiq_jobs
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Cleaning up Sidekiq jobs for project #{id}"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150.

                cleanup_jobs_by_args([
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  [id.to_s],                    # FinalizeTranscriptJob

              def cleanup_jobs_by_args(target_args)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                require 'sidekiq/api'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                # Clean up scheduled and retry queues
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                [Sidekiq::ScheduledSet.new, Sidekiq::RetrySet.new, Sidekiq::Queue.new].each do |queue|
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  queue.each do |job|
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    if target_args.include?(job.args.first.to_s)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Removing Sidekiq job: #{job.klass} with args #{job.args}"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      job.delete
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Failed to delete Sidekiq job: #{e.message}"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175.
