              def formatted_file_size
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                return "Unknown" if total_size_bytes.zero?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                units = %w[bytes KB MB GB TB]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                base = 1024
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                size = total_size_bytes.to_f
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if size < base
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  return "#{size.to_i} bytes"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                exp = (Math.log(size) / Math.log(base)).to_i
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                exp = [exp, units.length - 1].min
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                "%.1f %s" % [size / (base ** exp), units[exp]]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              def days_until_expiration
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                return 0 if expired?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                ((expires_at - Time.current) / 1.day).ceil
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              private
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80.

    82.

      40.

                  { id: 'Amy', name: 'Amy (British)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: true, language_code: 'en-GB' },
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Emma', name: 'Emma (British)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-GB' },
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Brian', name: 'Brian (British)', gender: 'Male', neural: true, standard: true, language_code: 'en-GB' },
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Arthur', name: 'Arthur (British)', gender: 'Male', neural: true, standard: true, language_code: 'en-GB' },
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # Welsh English (en-GB-WLS)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Geraint', name: 'Geraint (Welsh)', gender: 'Male', neural: false, standard: true, language_code: 'en-GB-WLS' },
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Australian English (en-AU)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Nicole', name: 'Nicole (Australian)', gender: 'Female', neural: false, standard: true, language_code: 'en-AU' },
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Olivia', name: 'Olivia (Australian)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-AU' },
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Russell', name: 'Russell (Australian)', gender: 'Male', neural: false, standard: true, language_code: 'en-AU' },
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Indian English (en-IN)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Aditi', name: 'Aditi (Indian)', gender: 'Female', neural: false, standard: true, language_code: 'en-IN' },
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Raveena', name: 'Raveena (Indian)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-IN' },
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Kajal', name: 'Kajal (Indian)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-IN' },
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # Irish English (en-IE)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Niamh', name: 'Niamh (Irish)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-IE' },
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # New Zealand English (en-NZ)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Aria', name: 'Aria (New Zealand)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-NZ' },
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  # Singaporean English (en-SG)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Jasmine', name: 'Jasmine (Singaporean)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-SG' },
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  # South African English (en-ZA)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  { id: 'Ayanda', name: 'Ayanda (South African)', gender: 'Female', neural: true, standard: false, language_code: 'en-ZA' }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                ].freeze
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                DEFAULT_LANGUAGE = 'en-US'
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                DEFAULT_VOICE = 'Joanna'
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                def initialize(user = nil)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  @client = Aws::Polly::Client.new(
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    region: ENV.fetch('AWS_REGION', 'us-east-1'),
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: ENV['AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'],
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: ENV['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  )
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  @s3_service = S3Service.new(user)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                def generate_speech(text:, voice_id: DEFAULT_VOICE, speech_rate: 100, language_code: nil, engine: nil)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  validate_voice_id!(voice_id)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  tracker = PerformanceTracker.instance
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Use development audio generation in development environment
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  if Rails.env.development?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    return generate_development_speech(text: text, voice_id: voice_id, speech_rate: speech_rate)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Get voice config to determine language if not provided
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  voice_config = tracker.track_event('voice_config_lookup', { voice_id: voice_id }) do
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    get_voice_config(voice_id)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  language_code ||= voice_config[:language_code] if voice_config
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  # Convert speech rate percentage to SSML prosody rate
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  prosody_rate = "#{speech_rate}%"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  # Wrap text in SSML for better control
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  ssml_text = build_ssml(text, prosody_rate)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  # Request speech synthesis
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  response = tracker.track_event('aws_polly_synthesis', { 
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    voice_id: voice_id,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    text_length: text.length,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    engine: engine || (voice_neural?(voice_id) ? 'neural' : 'standard')
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  }) do
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    @client.synthesize_speech({
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      output_format: 'mp3',
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      text: ssml_text,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      text_type: 'ssml',
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      voice_id: voice_id,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      language_code: language_code || DEFAULT_LANGUAGE,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      engine: engine || (voice_neural?(voice_id) ? 'neural' : 'standard')
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    })
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  # Generate unique S3 key
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  s3_key = generate_s3_key(voice_id)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  # Upload to S3
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  tracker.track_event('s3_upload', { key: s3_key }) do
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    @s3_service.upload_audio_data(s3_key, response.audio_stream)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  {
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    s3_key: s3_key,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    content_type: response.content_type,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    request_characters: response.request_characters
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                rescue Aws::Polly::Errors::ServiceError => e
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Polly service error: #{e.message}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  raise
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                def list_english_voices
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  SELECTED_VOICES
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                def list_all_voices
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  ENGLISH_VOICES
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                def voice_available?(voice_id)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  list_all_voices.any? { |voice| voice[:id] == voice_id }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                def get_voice_config(voice_id)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  list_all_voices.find { |v| v[:id] == voice_id }
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                private
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Development audio generation using macOS 'say' command
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                def generate_development_speech(text:, voice_id: DEFAULT_VOICE, speech_rate: 100)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🎵 Development mode: Using macOS 'say' command instead of AWS Polly for cost savings"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  tracker = PerformanceTracker.instance
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  # Map Polly voices to macOS system voices
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🎵 Input voice_id: '#{voice_id}' (class: #{voice_id.class})"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  macos_voice = tracker.track_event('macos_voice_mapping', { voice_id: voice_id }) do
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    mapped = map_polly_to_macos_voice(voice_id)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "🎵 Voice mapping result: '#{voice_id}' -> '#{mapped}'"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    mapped
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  # Validate that we have a valid macOS voice
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  if macos_voice.nil? || macos_voice.strip.empty?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "🎵 ERROR: macOS voice is nil or empty after mapping. Using fallback 'Alex'"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    macos_voice = 'Alex'
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🎵 Final macOS voice to use: '#{macos_voice}'"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  # Convert speech rate (100% = normal speed for say command)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  say_rate = (speech_rate * 2).clamp(50, 400) # say command uses words per minute, roughly 200 is normal
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  # Generate temporary file
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  temp_file = Rails.root.join('tmp', "say_#{SecureRandom.hex(8)}.aiff")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  mp3_file = Rails.root.join('tmp', "say_#{SecureRandom.hex(8)}.mp3")
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    # Use macOS 'say' command to generate speech
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    say_command = [
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                      'say',
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                      '-v', macos_voice,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      '-r', say_rate.to_s,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      '-o', temp_file.to_s,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      text
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "🎵 Executing: #{say_command.join(' ')}"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    # Track say command execution time
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    result = tracker.track_event('macos_say_command', { 
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      voice: macos_voice, 
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      rate: say_rate, 
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      text_length: text.length 
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    }) do
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      # Use backticks to capture stderr output
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      output = `#{say_command.shelljoin} 2>&1`
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                      exit_status = $?
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      success = exit_status && exit_status.exitstatus == 0
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "🎵 Say command output: #{output}" unless output.empty?
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "🎵 Say command exit status: #{exit_status&.exitstatus || 'nil'}"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      success
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    unless result
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      exit_status = $?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      status_msg = exit_status ? exit_status.exitstatus : 'command not executed'
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      raise "macOS 'say' command failed with exit status #{status_msg}"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    # Check if the output file was actually created
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    unless File.exist?(temp_file)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "🎵 ERROR: Say command succeeded but output file not created"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "🎵 Expected file: #{temp_file}"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "🎵 Current directory: #{Dir.pwd}"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "🎵 Temp directory contents: #{Dir.entries(Rails.root.join('tmp')).join(', ')}"
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      raise "Say command succeeded but output file not created: #{temp_file}"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "🎵 Output file created successfully: #{temp_file} (#{File.size(temp_file)} bytes)"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                    
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    # Convert AIFF to MP3 using ffmpeg (if available) or just use AIFF
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    audio_file, content_type = tracker.track_event('audio_format_conversion') do
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                      if system('which ffmpeg > /dev/null 2>&1')
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                        conversion_result = system('ffmpeg', '-i', temp_file.to_s, '-y', mp3_file.to_s, '-loglevel', 'error')
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                        audio_file = conversion_result ? mp3_file : temp_file
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                        content_type = conversion_result ? 'audio/mpeg' : 'audio/aiff'
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                        [audio_file, content_type]
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                      else
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "🎵 ffmpeg not found, using AIFF format (consider installing ffmpeg for MP3 conversion)"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                        [temp_file, 'audio/aiff']
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                      end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                    # Read the generated audio file
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                    audio_data = tracker.track_event('audio_file_read', { file_size: File.size(audio_file) }) do
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                      File.read(audio_file)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    # Generate unique S3 key
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    s3_key = generate_s3_key(voice_id)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                    
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                    # Upload to S3 using StringIO
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                    tracker.track_event('s3_upload', { key: s3_key, size: audio_data.bytesize }) do
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      audio_stream = StringIO.new(audio_data)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                      @s3_service.upload_audio_data(s3_key, audio_stream)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                    end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "🎵 Development audio generated and uploaded to S3: #{s3_key}"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    {
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                      s3_key: s3_key,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                      content_type: content_type,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      request_characters: text.length
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    }
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    # Clean up temporary files
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    tracker.track_event('temp_file_cleanup') do
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      [temp_file, mp3_file].each do |file|
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                        File.delete(file) if File.exist?(file)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    end
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "🎵 Development speech generation failed: #{e.class.name}: #{e.message}"
          
      275.

    277. 
            

            

                  raise "Development speech generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      278.

                end

                def voice_neural?(voice_id)

                def build_ssml(text, prosody_rate)

    341. 
            

            

                  <<~SSML
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                    <speak>
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                      <prosody rate="#{prosody_rate}">
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                        #{CGI.escapeHTML(text)}
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                      </prosody>
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                    </speak>
          
      347.

      349.

                def generate_s3_key(voice_id)
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                  prefix = case Rails.env
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                           when 'production'
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                             'production/'
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                           when 'staging'
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                             'staging/'
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                           else
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                             'dev/'
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                           end
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                  timestamp = Time.now.to_i
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                  random_string = SecureRandom.hex(8)
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}polly_audio/#{voice_id.downcase}/#{timestamp}_#{random_string}.mp3"
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                end
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                def get_presigned_url(s3_key, expires_in = 3600)

              end

            end

            class GeminiContentAnalysisService
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              GEMINI_API_BASE = 'https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta'
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def initialize(api_key = nil)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @api_key = api_key || ENV['GEMINI_API_KEY']
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @model = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @max_tokens = 2048
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @temperature = 0.1
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                raise "GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable not set" unless @api_key
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # Analyze transcribed segments and generate image queries for Ken Burns videos
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              # @param segments [Array] Transcribed audio segments
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Analysis options
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Segments with image queries and timing
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              def analyze_content_for_images(segments, options = {})
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🧠 Analyzing content for image generation using Gemini..."
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Check for cached analysis (respect force option)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                cache_file = get_cache_file_path(segments, options)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                if File.exist?(cache_file) && !options[:force]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "    📁 Using cached content analysis from: #{cache_file}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  cached_data = JSON.parse(File.read(cache_file), symbolize_names: true)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  return cached_data
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                elsif options[:force]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "    🔄 Force mode enabled - bypassing cache"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Process segments in smaller batches to avoid API limits
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                batch_size = 10  # Process 10 segments at a time
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                all_results = []
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  📝 Analyzing #{segments.length} segments in batches of #{batch_size}..."
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                segments.each_slice(batch_size).with_index do |batch, batch_index|
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "    🔄 Processing batch #{batch_index + 1}/#{(segments.length.to_f / batch_size).ceil} (#{batch.length} segments)"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    # Build prompt for this batch
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    prompt = build_batch_analysis_prompt(batch, options)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    # Make API request for this batch
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    # Parse the response
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    batch_results = parse_batch_analysis_response(response, batch)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    # Add to overall results
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    all_results.concat(batch_results)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Add delay between batches to respect rate limits
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    sleep(2) if batch_index < (segments.length.to_f / batch_size).ceil - 1
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "    ❌ Error processing batch #{batch_index + 1}: #{e.message}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    # Add segments with fallback queries instead of failing completely
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    batch.each do |segment|
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      all_results << segment.merge({
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        image_queries: generate_fallback_queries(segment[:text] || segment['text'] || ''),
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        has_images: true
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      })
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Cache the analysis result
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "    💾 Caching content analysis to: #{cache_file}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                File.write(cache_file, JSON.pretty_generate(all_results))
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "✅ Content analysis completed: #{all_results.length} segments processed"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                all_results
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              # Generate image queries for a specific text segment
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              # @param text [String] Text to analyze
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              # @param context [Hash] Additional context
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Image queries
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def generate_image_queries_for_text(text, context = {})
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                prompt = build_single_text_prompt(text, context)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                parsed = parse_analysis_response(response)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                parsed[:image_queries] || []
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              private
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              # Generate cache file path for content analysis
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              # @param segments [Array] Audio segments
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Analysis options
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Cache file path
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def get_cache_file_path(segments, options)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                # Create a hash of the segments and options to generate a unique cache key
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                content_hash = Digest::MD5.hexdigest(segments.to_json + options.to_json)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                cache_dir = Rails.root.join('tmp', 'cache', 'gemini_analysis')
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(cache_dir) unless Dir.exist?(cache_dir)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                File.join(cache_dir, "gemini_analysis_#{content_hash}.json")
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              # Build prompt for single text analysis
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              # @param text [String] Text to analyze
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              # @param context [Hash] Additional context
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Formatted prompt
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def build_single_text_prompt(text, context = {})
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                context_type = context[:type] || "content"
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                style = context[:style] || "realistic, high-quality"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  You are an expert at analyzing text and determining what images would best illustrate the content.
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  CONTEXT: This is #{context_type} that needs visual accompaniment.
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  TEXT: "#{text.strip}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  TASK: Generate 2-3 specific image search queries that would create compelling visual accompaniment.
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  - Generate queries that are specific and descriptive
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  - Focus on visual elements mentioned or implied in the text
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  - Each query should be 2-6 words maximum
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  - Prioritize queries that would work well for Ken Burns effects
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  {
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    "image_queries": [
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      "specific visual query 1",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      "specific visual query 2"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    ],
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    "visual_style": "#{style}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                prompt
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              # Make request to Gemini API
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The prompt to send
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] API response
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              def make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                uri = URI("#{GEMINI_API_BASE}/models/#{@model}:generateContent?key=#{@api_key}")
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                request.body = {
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  contents: [
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    {
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      parts: [
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        {
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                          text: prompt
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  ],
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  generationConfig: {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    temperature: @temperature,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    maxOutputTokens: @max_tokens,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    topP: 0.8,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    topK: 40
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                }.to_json
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                response = make_request(request, uri)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                if response['error']
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  raise "Gemini API Error: #{response['error']['message']}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                response
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              # Make HTTP request
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              # @param request [Net::HTTP::Request] The request object
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              # @param uri [URI] The URI object
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Parsed JSON response
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def make_request(request, uri)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                http.use_ssl = true
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                http.read_timeout = 60
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                http.open_timeout = 30
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                if response.code != '200'
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  raise "HTTP Error: #{response.code} - #{response.message}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                raise "Request failed: #{e.message}"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              # Parse analysis response from Gemini
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              # @param response [Hash] Gemini API response
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Parsed analysis result
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def parse_analysis_response(response)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                content = response.dig('candidates', 0, 'content', 'parts', 0, 'text')
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                return { image_queries: [], primary_theme: '', visual_style: '' } unless content
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                begin
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  # Try to parse as JSON
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  parsed = JSON.parse(content.strip)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  # Validate structure
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  {
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    image_queries: parsed['image_queries'] || [],
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    primary_theme: parsed['primary_theme'] || '',
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    visual_style: parsed['visual_style'] || 'realistic, high-quality',
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    duration_suggestion: parsed['duration_suggestion']
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  # Fallback: try to extract queries from text
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  {
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    image_queries: extract_queries_from_text(content),
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    primary_theme: 'extracted from content',
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226.
