            class ImageServiceBus
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              attr_reader :clients, :logger, :used_clients
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def initialize(config = {})
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @logger = Rails.logger
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @used_clients = Set.new
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @config = config
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Initialize API clients
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @clients = {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  unsplash: UnsplashClient.new(config[:unsplash] || {}),
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  pexels: PexelsClient.new(config[:pexels] || {}),
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  pixabay: PixabayClient.new(config[:pixabay] || {}),
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  lorem_picsum: LoremPicsumClient.new(config[:lorem_picsum] || {}),
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  openverse: OpenverseClient.new(config[:openverse] || {}),
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  wikimedia: WikimediaClient.new(config[:wikimedia] || {})
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @logger.info("ImageServiceBus initialized with #{@clients.keys.length} clients")
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def get_images(query, count = 3, target_resolution = '1080p', category = 'general')
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔍 ImageServiceBus: Getting #{count} images for query '#{query}' (category: #{category})"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                results = []
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Determine client priority based on category
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                if category == 'famous_person'
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # For famous persons, prioritize Wikimedia first, then regular sources
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  primary_clients = [:wikimedia]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  fallback_clients = [:unsplash, :pexels, :pixabay, :openverse, :lorem_picsum]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "👤 Famous person detected - prioritizing Wikimedia"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # For stock images and general content, use traditional priority
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  primary_clients = [:unsplash, :pexels, :pixabay]
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  fallback_clients = [:openverse, :wikimedia, :lorem_picsum]
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # For speed optimization: limit attempts and reduce delays
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                all_clients = primary_clients + fallback_clients
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                attempts = 0
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                max_attempts = [all_clients.length, 6].min # Limit max attempts for speed
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                while results.empty? && attempts < max_attempts
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  client_name = all_clients[attempts % all_clients.length]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  client = @clients[client_name]
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  attempts += 1
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  next unless client
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔍 ImageServiceBus: Attempting #{client_name} (attempt #{attempts}/#{max_attempts})"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    # Reduced delay for faster processing
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    sleep(0.1) if attempts > 1
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    result = client.search_images(query, target_resolution)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    if result && result[:images] && !result[:images].empty?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      # Filter out placeholder/low quality images
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      quality_images = result[:images].select { |img| is_quality_image?(img) }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      if quality_images.any?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        filtered_result = result.merge(images: quality_images)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                        results << filtered_result
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "✅ ImageServiceBus: Got #{quality_images.length} quality images from #{client_name}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        break # Success! Stop trying other clients
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      else
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "⚠️  ImageServiceBus: #{client_name} returned only placeholder images"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "⚠️  ImageServiceBus: No results from #{client_name}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "❌ ImageServiceBus: Error with #{client_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    # Continue to next client
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                # If still no results, try with relaxed quality requirements
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if results.empty?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "🔄 ImageServiceBus: Retrying with relaxed quality requirements"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  results = get_images_relaxed(query, target_resolution)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "🔍 ImageServiceBus: Returning #{results.length} results"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                results
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              def get_single_image(query, target_resolution = '1080p', category = 'general')
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                result = get_images(query, 1, target_resolution, category)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                result.first
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              def client_status
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                status = {}
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                @clients.each do |name, client|
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  status[name] = {
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    available: client.respond_to?(:available?) ? client.available? : true,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    rate_limit_info: client.respond_to?(:rate_limit_info) ? client.rate_limit_info : nil
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                status
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              private
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              # Check if image meets quality requirements
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              # @param image [Hash] Image data
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              # @return [Boolean] True if image is good quality
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              def is_quality_image?(image)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                return false unless image && image[:url]
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                url = image[:url]
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                # Skip placeholder patterns and low-quality indicators
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                low_quality_patterns = [
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  /placeholder/i,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  /default/i,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  /notfound/i,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  /404/i,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  /missing/i,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  /unavailable/i,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  /lorem/i,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  /picsum\.photos.*\?blur/i, # Skip blurred Lorem Picsum images
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  /thumb/i,                   # Skip thumbnail versions
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  /small/i,                   # Skip small versions
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  /compressed/i,              # Skip heavily compressed
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  /preview/i,                 # Skip preview versions
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  /low.*res/i,               # Skip low resolution indicators
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  /grainy/i,                 # Skip explicitly grainy images
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  /pixelated/i,              # Skip pixelated images
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  /\?w=\d{1,3}[&$]/,         # Skip URLs with small width parameters (< 1000px)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  /\?h=\d{1,3}[&$]/,         # Skip URLs with small height parameters (< 1000px)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  /size=small/i,             # Skip small size parameters
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  /quality=low/i             # Skip low quality parameters
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                ]
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                return false if low_quality_patterns.any? { |pattern| url.match?(pattern) }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                # STRICT minimum dimensions for high-quality Ken Burns effects
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                if image[:width] && image[:height]
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  # Require MUCH higher resolution - Ken Burns needs room to zoom and pan
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  min_width = 2560   # Minimum 2560px width for smooth 1080p output
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  min_height = 1440  # Minimum 1440px height for smooth 1080p output
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  return false if image[:width] < min_width || image[:height] < min_height
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  # Reject images with poor aspect ratios that might be low quality
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  aspect_ratio = image[:width].to_f / image[:height].to_f
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  return false if aspect_ratio < 0.5 || aspect_ratio > 3.0  # Reject extreme ratios
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  # Prefer larger images - they usually have better quality
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  total_pixels = image[:width] * image[:height]
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  return false if total_pixels < 3_686_400  # Minimum ~3.7MP (2560x1440)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                # Additional URL-based quality checks
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Prefer images from URLs that indicate high quality
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                quality_indicators = [
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  /\d{4,}x\d{4,}/,           # URLs containing large dimensions
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  /hd/i,                     # HD indicator
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  /high.*res/i,              # High resolution indicator
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  /full.*res/i,              # Full resolution indicator
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  /original/i,               # Original size indicator
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  /large/i,                  # Large size indicator
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  /4k/i,                     # 4K indicator
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  /uhd/i,                    # Ultra HD indicator
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  /raw/i,                    # Raw/uncompressed indicator
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  /uncompressed/i            # Uncompressed indicator
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                ]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # Boost score for quality indicators but don't require them
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                has_quality_indicator = quality_indicators.any? { |pattern| url.match?(pattern) }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                # For Ken Burns, we need the highest possible quality
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                # If dimensions aren't available, be more strict about URL quality indicators
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                if !image[:width] || !image[:height]
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  return has_quality_indicator  # Require quality indicators if no dimensions
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                true
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              # Get images with relaxed quality requirements
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              # @param query [String] Search query
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              # @param target_resolution [String] Target resolution
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Results with relaxed requirements
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              def get_images_relaxed(query, target_resolution)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                results = []
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                # Try each client once more with relaxed but still reasonable minimums
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                @clients.each do |client_name, client|
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    result = client.search_images(query, target_resolution)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    if result && result[:images] && !result[:images].empty?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      # Apply relaxed quality filter - still require decent resolution
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                      relaxed_quality_images = result[:images].select { |img| is_relaxed_quality_image?(img) }
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      if relaxed_quality_images.any?
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                        filtered_result = result.merge(images: relaxed_quality_images)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                        results << filtered_result
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "✅ ImageServiceBus: Accepted relaxed quality from #{client_name} (#{relaxed_quality_images.length} images)"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                        break # Take first available result
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "❌ ImageServiceBus: Relaxed attempt failed for #{client_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                results
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              # Check if image meets relaxed quality requirements
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              def is_relaxed_quality_image?(image)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                return false unless image && image[:url]
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                url = image[:url]
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                # Skip obvious low-quality patterns (more permissive than strict)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                low_quality_patterns = [
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  /placeholder/i,
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  /default/i,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  /notfound/i,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  /404/i,
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  /missing/i,
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  /unavailable/i,
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  /grainy/i,                 # Still reject explicitly grainy images
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  /pixelated/i,              # Still reject pixelated images
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  /\?w=\d{1,2}[&$]/,         # Reject very small width parameters (< 100px)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  /\?h=\d{1,2}[&$]/,         # Reject very small height parameters (< 100px)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  /quality=low/i             # Still reject explicitly low quality
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                ]
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                return false if low_quality_patterns.any? { |pattern| url.match?(pattern) }
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                # Relaxed but still decent minimum dimensions for Ken Burns
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                if image[:width] && image[:height]
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  min_width = 1920   # Still require Full HD minimum for relaxed
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  min_height = 1080  # Still require Full HD minimum for relaxed
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  return false if image[:width] < min_width || image[:height] < min_height
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  # Still reject extreme aspect ratios
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  aspect_ratio = image[:width].to_f / image[:height].to_f
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  return false if aspect_ratio < 0.3 || aspect_ratio > 4.0  # More permissive but still reasonable
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                  
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  # Minimum pixel count for relaxed quality
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  total_pixels = image[:width] * image[:height]
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  return false if total_pixels < 2_073_600  # Minimum ~2MP (1920x1080)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                true
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

              end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            end
          
      267.

    app/services/image_apis/lorem_picsum_client.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    32 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 32 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require_relative 'base_image_client'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class LoremPicsumClient < BaseImageClient
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def initialize(config = {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                super(config)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @base_url = 'https://picsum.photos'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def search_images(query, target_resolution = '1080p')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                dimensions = get_image_dimensions(target_resolution)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                images = []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                5.times do |i|
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  random_id = rand(1..1000)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  images << {
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    url: "#{@base_url}/#{dimensions[:width]}/#{dimensions[:height]}?random=#{random_id}",
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    download_url: "#{@base_url}/#{dimensions[:width]}/#{dimensions[:height]}?random=#{random_id}",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    width: dimensions[:width],
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    height: dimensions[:height],
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    description: "Random placeholder image #{i + 1}",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    photographer: "Lorem Picsum",
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    photographer_url: "https://picsum.photos",
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    metadata: {
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      id: random_id,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      seed: random_id
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  provider: 'lorem_picsum',
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  query: query,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  images: images
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                }
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            end
          
      35.

    app/services/image_apis/openverse_client.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    37 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 37 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require_relative 'base_image_client'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class OpenverseClient < BaseImageClient
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def initialize(config = {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                super(config)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @base_url = 'https://api.openverse.engineering/v1'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def search_images(query, target_resolution = '1080p')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                dimensions = get_image_dimensions(target_resolution)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                url = "#{@base_url}/images/?q=#{URI.encode_www_form_component(query)}&page_size=10&filter=license_type:commercial&filter=license_type:modification&filter=aspect_ratio:wide"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                headers = {
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  'Accept' => 'application/json'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                data = make_request(url, headers)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                return nil unless data
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  provider: 'openverse',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  query: query,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  images: data['results'].map do |image|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      url: image['url'],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      download_url: image['url'],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      width: image['width'] || dimensions[:width],
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      height: image['height'] || dimensions[:height],
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      description: image['title'] || image['alt_text'],
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      photographer: image['creator'] || 'Unknown',
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      photographer_url: image['creator_url'],
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      metadata: {
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        id: image['id'],
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        license: image['license'],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                        license_version: image['license_version'],
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        tags: image['tags']&.map { |tag| tag['name'] } || []
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    }

              def search_images(query, target_resolution = '1080p')

    48. 
            

            

                    img[:width] >= 2400 && img[:height] >= 1200 &&  # Higher resolution requirement

                    img[:metadata][:likes] >= 10 &&  # Require some popularity

              private
          
      59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              def calculate_quality_score(photo)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                # Calculate quality score based on Pixabay metrics
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                score = 0
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                # Dimension score
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                if photo['imageWidth'] && photo['imageHeight']
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  pixel_count = photo['imageWidth'] * photo['imageHeight']
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  score += (pixel_count / 1_000_000.0) * 8  # 8 points per megapixel
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                # Social metrics
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                score += (photo['likes'] || 0) * 0.2
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                score += (photo['downloads'] || 0) * 0.01
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                score += (photo['comments'] || 0) * 0.5
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                # Quality indicators in tags
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                quality_tags = ['hd', 'high resolution', '4k', 'professional', 'studio']
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                tag_string = (photo['tags'] || '').downcase
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                quality_tags.each do |tag|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  score += 10 if tag_string.include?(tag)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                score
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            end
          
      85.

              def search_images(query, target_resolution = '1080p')
          
      11.

    22.

                data = make_request(url, headers)

                    img[:width] && img[:height] &&

              private
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def calculate_quality_score(photo)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                # Calculate a quality score based on various factors
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                score = 0
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Dimension score (higher resolution = better)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                if photo['width'] && photo['height']
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  pixel_count = photo['width'] * photo['height']
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  score += (pixel_count / 1_000_000.0) * 10  # 10 points per megapixel
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Social validation score (likes)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                score += (photo['likes'] || 0) * 0.1
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Premium/Plus status bonus
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                score += 20 if photo['user']['for_hire'] == true
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # Description quality bonus (longer descriptions often indicate curated content)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                description_length = (photo['description'] || photo['alt_description'] || '').length
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                score += [description_length / 10.0, 10].min
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                score
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            end
          
      86.

              def search_images(query, target_resolution = '1080p')

              def build_url(base_url, params)

    64.

              def get_image_details(titles)

    69. 
            

            

                return [] if titles.empty?

                  imageinfo = page['imageinfo'].first

      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  # Skip video files - we only want static images
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  file_url = imageinfo['url']
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  if file_url&.match(/\.(webm|mp4|avi|mov|wmv|flv|mkv|ogv)$/i)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Skipping video file: #{File.basename(file_url)}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    next
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  # Skip very large files (>50MB) - likely videos or high-res archives
          
      113.

                  file_size = imageinfo['size'].to_i
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  if file_size > 50_000_000  # 50MB limit
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Skipping large file (#{(file_size/1024/1024).round}MB): #{File.basename(file_url)}"
          
      116.

                    next

    117. 
            

            

                  end
          
      118.

                  # Check if image meets size requirements

              def extract_license(extmetadata)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                license_field = extmetadata['License'] || extmetadata['license']
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                if license_field && license_field['value']
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  license_field['value']
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  'Unknown'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                end

    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152.

    153. 
            

            

              def extract_author(extmetadata)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                author_field = extmetadata['Author'] || extmetadata['author'] || extmetadata['Artist'] || extmetadata['artist']
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                if author_field && author_field['value']
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  author_field['value']
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                else
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  'Wikimedia Commons'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end

    160.

              def extract_author_url(extmetadata)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                author_url_field = extmetadata['AuthorURL'] || extmetadata['authorurl']
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                if author_url_field && author_url_field['value']
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  author_url_field['value']
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                else
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              def extract_description(extmetadata)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                desc_field = extmetadata['ImageDescription'] || extmetadata['imagedescription'] || extmetadata['Description'] || extmetadata['description']
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                if desc_field && desc_field['value']
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  desc_field['value']
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                else
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              def extract_usage_restrictions(extmetadata)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                restrictions = []
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                # Check for various restriction indicators
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                restriction_fields = ['Restrictions', 'restrictions', 'UsageRestrictions', 'usagerestrictions']
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                restriction_fields.each do |field|
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  if extmetadata[field] && extmetadata[field]['value']
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    restrictions << extmetadata[field]['value']
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                restrictions.empty? ? nil : restrictions.join(', ')
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            end
          
      194.

    app/services/interview_flow_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    123 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 123 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class InterviewFlowService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def initialize(project)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                @project = project
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Initialized with project id: #{@project.id}, title: #{@project.title}"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Project is_speech_interview: #{@project.is_speech_interview}, status: #{@project.status}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def generate_question_queue
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Starting generate_question_queue for project #{@project.id}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                answered_question_ids = get_answered_question_ids
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Answered question IDs: #{answered_question_ids.inspect}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Array of integers, ACTUAL: #{answered_question_ids.class.name} with #{answered_question_ids.size} items"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Get all non-omitted, non-skipped questions for the project
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Fetching all non-omitted questions"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                all_questions = @project.questions
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                         .joins(section: :chapter)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                         .includes(section: { chapter: :project }, polly_audio_clip: [])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                                         .where(omitted: false, skipped: false, sections: { omitted: false }, chapters: { omitted: false })
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                                         .order("chapters.order ASC, sections.order ASC, questions.order ASC")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] All questions count: #{all_questions.size}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: ActiveRecord::Relation with questions, ACTUAL: #{all_questions.class.name}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] First 3 questions: #{all_questions.first(3).map { |q| { id: q.id, text: q.text[0..50], is_follow_up: q.is_follow_up } }}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Filter out the questions that have already been answered
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Filtering out answered questions"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                unanswered_questions = all_questions.reject { |q| answered_question_ids.include?(q.id) }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Unanswered questions count: #{unanswered_questions.size}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Fewer questions than all_questions, ACTUAL: #{all_questions.size} - #{answered_question_ids.size} = #{unanswered_questions.size}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Sort to place follow-ups immediately after their answered parents.
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # And prioritize any unanswered follow-ups whose parents ARE answered.
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Separate into three groups:
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # 1. Urgent follow-ups (parent answered, follow-up is not)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # 2. Standard main questions
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # 3. Follow-ups whose parents haven't been answered yet
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                urgent_follow_ups = unanswered_questions.select do |q|
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  is_urgent = q.is_follow_up? && q.parent_question_id.in?(answered_question_ids)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  if is_urgent
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Found urgent follow-up: question_id=#{q.id}, parent_id=#{q.parent_question_id}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  is_urgent
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Urgent follow-ups found: #{urgent_follow_ups.size}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Follow-ups with answered parents, ACTUAL: #{urgent_follow_ups.map { |q| { id: q.id, parent: q.parent_question_id } }}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                standard_queue = unanswered_questions.reject do |q|
