      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  q.is_follow_up?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Standard questions (non-follow-ups): #{standard_queue.size}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Main questions only, ACTUAL: #{standard_queue.first(3).map { |q| { id: q.id, is_follow_up: q.is_follow_up } }}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # The final queue is urgent follow-ups first, then the rest of the standard questions.
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # This ensures that as soon as a question is answered, its follow-ups jump to the front of the line.
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                final_queue = (urgent_follow_ups + standard_queue).uniq(&:id)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Final queue composition:"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Total questions: #{final_queue.length}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Urgent follow-ups: #{urgent_follow_ups.count}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Standard questions: #{standard_queue.count}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: urgent_follow_ups + standard_queue, ACTUAL: #{final_queue.length} total"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] First 5 in queue: #{final_queue.first(5).map { |q| { id: q.id, is_follow_up: q.is_follow_up, parent: q.parent_question_id } }}"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                return final_queue
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              # Insert new follow-up questions into an existing queue at the optimal position
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def insert_followup_questions(current_queue, parent_question_id, new_followups)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] insert_followup_questions called"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Current queue size: #{current_queue.size}"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Parent question ID: #{parent_question_id}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - New follow-ups count: #{new_followups.size}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                return current_queue if new_followups.empty?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                # Find the parent question index in the current queue
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                parent_index = current_queue.find_index { |q| q.id == parent_question_id }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Parent question index: #{parent_index}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Integer index >= 0, ACTUAL: #{parent_index.inspect}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                unless parent_index
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Parent question #{parent_question_id} not found in queue!"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  return current_queue
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                # Find the insertion point (after parent and existing follow-ups)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                insertion_index = find_insertion_point(current_queue, parent_index, parent_question_id)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Insertion index: #{insertion_index}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Index after parent and existing follow-ups, ACTUAL: #{insertion_index}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # Insert new follow-ups at the calculated position
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Inserting #{new_followups.size} follow-ups at position #{insertion_index}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                current_queue.insert(insertion_index, *new_followups)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Queue size after insertion: #{current_queue.size}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Original size + new follow-ups, ACTUAL: #{current_queue.size}"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                current_queue
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              # Get the next priority question that should be asked
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def get_next_priority_question(current_queue, current_index)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] get_next_priority_question called"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Queue size: #{current_queue.length}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG]   - Current index: #{current_index}"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Valid index < queue.length - 1, ACTUAL: #{current_index} < #{current_queue.length - 1}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Check if there are any new high-priority follow-ups that should be inserted
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                # before continuing with the regular flow
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                # For now, just return the next question in sequence
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if current_index >= current_queue.length - 1
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] No more questions available (at end of queue)"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                next_question = current_queue[current_index + 1]
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Next question: id=#{next_question.id}, is_follow_up=#{next_question.is_follow_up}"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                next_question
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              private
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def get_base_questions_ordered
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                @project.questions
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        .joins(:section)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                        .where(is_follow_up: false)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                        .where(sections: { omitted: false }, omitted: false)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        .includes(:section, follow_up_questions: [])
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                        .order('sections.order ASC, questions.order ASC')
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              def get_all_existing_followups
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                @project.questions
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                        .joins(:section)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                        .where(is_follow_up: true)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        .where(sections: { omitted: false }, omitted: false)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                        .includes(:section)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                        .order('questions.parent_question_id ASC, questions.order ASC')
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              def get_followup_questions_for(parent_question)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                # Follow-up questions are now preloaded, so filter in memory
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                parent_question.follow_up_questions
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                               .select { |q| !q.omitted }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                               .sort_by(&:order)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              def find_insertion_point(queue, parent_index, parent_question_id)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # Start looking after the parent question
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                index = parent_index + 1
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # Skip over existing follow-ups for the same parent
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                while index < queue.length && 
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      queue[index].is_follow_up && 
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      queue[index].parent_question_id == parent_question_id
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  index += 1
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                index
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              def get_answered_question_ids
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Getting answered question IDs for project #{@project.id}"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                # Get all question IDs that have associated audio segments
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                segments = @project.audio_segments.where.not(question_id: nil)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Found #{segments.count} audio segments with question_ids"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                question_ids = segments.distinct.pluck(:question_id)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] Distinct question IDs: #{question_ids.inspect}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[INTERVIEW_FLOW_DEBUG] EXPECTED: Array of non-nil integers, ACTUAL: #{question_ids.select(&:nil?).any? ? 'Contains nil!' : 'All valid'}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                question_ids
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            end
          
      181.

    app/services/interview_question_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    410 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 410 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require 'net/http'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            require 'json'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            class InterviewQuestionService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              GEMINI_API_BASE = 'https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta'
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def initialize(api_key = nil)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @api_key = api_key || ENV['GEMINI_API_KEY']
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @model = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite'
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @max_tokens = 2048
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @temperature = 0.7
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                raise "GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable not set" unless @api_key
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # Generate interview questions for a given topic
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # @param topic [String] The topic for interview questions
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Generation options
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Structured interview outline
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              def generate_interview_outline(topic, options = {})
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Use options if provided, otherwise use defaults
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                num_chapters = options[:num_chapters] || 1
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                sections_per_chapter = options[:sections_per_chapter] || 1
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                questions_per_section = options[:questions_per_section] || 10
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                prompt = build_interview_outline_prompt(topic, num_chapters, sections_per_chapter, questions_per_section)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                parse_interview_outline_response(response)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # Generate additional questions for a specific section
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # @param section_context [Hash] Context about the section
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # @param num_questions [Integer] Number of questions to generate
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Additional questions
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def generate_section_questions(section_context, num_questions = 3)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                prompt = build_section_questions_prompt(section_context, num_questions)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                parse_section_questions_response(response)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              # Refine existing questions based on feedback
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              # @param questions [Array] Existing questions
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # @param feedback [String] Feedback for improvement
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Refined questions
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def refine_questions(questions, feedback)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                prompt = build_question_refinement_prompt(questions, feedback)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                parse_refined_questions_response(response)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # Generate follow-up questions based on user's answer
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # @param original_question_text [String] The original question
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # @param user_answer [String] The user's answer
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Follow-up questions
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def generate_followup_questions(original_question_text:, user_answer:)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                prompt = build_followup_prompt(original_question_text, user_answer)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                parse_followup_response(response)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              # Generate additional chapters for an existing project
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              # @param project [Project] The project to expand
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Additional chapters structure
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              def generate_additional_chapters(project)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                prompt = build_additional_chapters_prompt(project)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                parse_interview_outline_response(response)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # Generate interview questions based on tracker context
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              # @param tracker_name [String] The name of the tracker
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              # @param tracker_context [String] The context from tracker entries
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Structured interview outline
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              def generate_interview_from_tracker(tracker_name, tracker_context)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                prompt = build_tracker_interview_prompt(tracker_name, tracker_context)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                parse_interview_outline_response(response)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              # Generate additional questions for unlimited interview mode
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              # @param context [Hash] Context including existing questions and answers
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              # @param num_questions [Integer] Number of questions to generate
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Additional question texts
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              def generate_additional_questions_for_unlimited(context, num_questions = 20)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                prompt = build_unlimited_questions_prompt(context, num_questions)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                response = make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                parse_unlimited_questions_response(response)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              private
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              def build_interview_outline_prompt(topic, num_chapters, sections_per_chapter, questions_per_section)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interview designer creating a comprehensive interview outline.
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  TOPIC: #{topic}
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  TASK: Create a structured interview outline with:
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  - #{num_chapters} chapters (main themes/areas)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  - #{sections_per_chapter} sections per chapter (sub-topics)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  - #{questions_per_section} questions per section (specific interview questions)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  - Questions should be open-ended and thought-provoking
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  - Progress from general to specific within each section
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  - Ensure logical flow between chapters and sections
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  - Questions should encourage detailed, personal responses
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  - Avoid yes/no questions
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  - Include follow-up question suggestions where appropriate
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  - Make questions conversational and engaging
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  {
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    "title": "Interview about [topic]",
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    "chapters": [
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      {
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        "title": "Chapter title",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                        "order": 1,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                        "sections": [
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                          {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                            "title": "Section title",
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                            "order": 1,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                            "questions": [
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                              {
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                                "text": "Question text here?",
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                                "order": 1
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                              }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                            ]
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                          }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              def build_section_questions_prompt(section_context, num_questions)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                chapter_title = section_context[:chapter_title]
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                section_title = section_context[:section_title]
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                existing_questions = section_context[:existing_questions] || []
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interview designer adding questions to an existing section.
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  CONTEXT:
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  Chapter: #{chapter_title}
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  Section: #{section_title}
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  EXISTING QUESTIONS:
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  #{existing_questions.map.with_index { |q, i| "#{i + 1}. #{q}" }.join("\n")}
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  TASK: Generate #{num_questions} additional interview questions for this section that:
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  - Complement the existing questions without being repetitive
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  - Maintain the same theme and depth level
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  - Are open-ended and encourage detailed responses
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  - Flow naturally with the existing questions
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    "questions": [
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                        "text": "Question text here?",
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        "order": #{existing_questions.length + 1}
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              def build_question_refinement_prompt(questions, feedback)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interview designer refining questions based on feedback.
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  CURRENT QUESTIONS:
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  #{questions.map.with_index { |q, i| "#{i + 1}. #{q[:text] || q['text']}" }.join("\n")}
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  FEEDBACK: #{feedback}
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  TASK: Refine the questions based on the feedback while maintaining:
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  - The overall intent and structure
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  - Open-ended nature that encourages detailed responses
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  - Logical flow and progression
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  - Conversational tone
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  {
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    "questions": [
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      {
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                        "text": "Refined question text here?",
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                        "order": 1
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      }
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  }
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              def build_followup_prompt(original_question, answer)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                You are an expert interviewer. Based on the user's answer to an original question, generate 1 to 3 insightful, open-ended follow-up questions. The goal is to dig deeper into the user's response, clarify points, or explore related tangents.
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                ORIGINAL QUESTION:
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                "#{original_question}"
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                USER'S ANSWER:
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                "#{answer}"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                TASK:
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                Generate 1 to 3 follow-up questions.
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  "questions": [
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    { "text": "First follow-up question?" },
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    { "text": "Second follow-up question?" }
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                }
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              def build_additional_chapters_prompt(project)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                existing_chapters = project.chapters.includes(sections: :questions).map do |chapter|
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  {
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    title: chapter.title,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    sections: chapter.sections.map do |section|
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      {
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                        title: section.title,
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                        questions: section.questions.base_questions.map(&:text)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                      }
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  }
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                # Get interview context from transcripts/audio segments
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                interview_context = ""
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                if project.audio_segments.any?
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  recent_transcripts = project.audio_segments
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                                             .where.not(transcription_text: [nil, ""])
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                                             .limit(10)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                                             .pluck(:transcription_text)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  interview_context = recent_transcripts.join("\n\n")
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interview designer creating additional chapters for an existing interview project.
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  ORIGINAL TOPIC: #{project.topic}
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  EXISTING CHAPTERS AND STRUCTURE:
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  #{existing_chapters.map.with_index do |chapter, i|
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    sections_text = chapter[:sections].map.with_index do |section, j|
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      questions_text = section[:questions].map.with_index { |q, k| "        #{k + 1}. #{q}" }.join("\n")
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      "    Section #{j + 1}: #{section[:title]}\n#{questions_text}"
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    end.join("\n")
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    "Chapter #{i + 1}: #{chapter[:title]}\n#{sections_text}"
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  end.join("\n\n")}
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  #{"INTERVIEW CONTEXT (from recent recordings):\n#{interview_context}\n\n" if interview_context.present?}
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  TASK: Generate 2-3 additional chapters that:
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  - Expand on the original topic without repeating existing content
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  - Complement the existing chapters by exploring new angles or deeper aspects
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  - Follow the same structure (2 sections per chapter, 3 questions per section)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  - Take into account any themes or insights from the interview context
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  - Are logically ordered as a continuation of the existing outline
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  - Maintain the same depth and interview style as existing questions
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  - Questions should be open-ended and thought-provoking
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  - Avoid any overlap with existing chapters/sections/questions
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  - Build upon themes that may have emerged from the interview context
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  - Ensure smooth progression from the existing content
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  - Use the next available order numbers for chapters
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  {
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                    "chapters": [
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                      {
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                        "title": "New chapter title",
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                        "order": #{existing_chapters.length + 1},
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                        "sections": [
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                          {
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                            "title": "Section title",
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                            "order": 1,
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                            "questions": [
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                              {
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                                "text": "Question text here?",
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                                "order": 1
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                              }
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                            ]
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                          }
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                      }
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  }
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

              end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

              def build_tracker_interview_prompt(tracker_name, tracker_context)
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interview designer creating a personalized interview based on tracker data.
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

            
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  TRACKER NAME: #{tracker_name}
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

            
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  TRACKER CONTEXT (recent entries):
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                  #{tracker_context}
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  TASK: Create a structured interview outline with:
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  - 3 chapters (main themes/areas) that explore the user's experience with this tracker
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  - 2 sections per chapter (sub-topics)
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  - 3 questions per section (specific interview questions)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  - Questions should be deeply personalized based on the tracker context provided
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  - Explore patterns, insights, and reflections related to the tracking data
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  - Questions should be open-ended and encourage detailed, personal responses
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                  - Progress from general reflection to specific insights within each section
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                  - Reference specific patterns or themes from the tracker entries when relevant
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                  - Avoid yes/no questions
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                  - Make questions conversational and engaging
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                  - Help the user reflect on their journey and growth in this area
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

            
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  CHAPTER THEMES TO CONSIDER:
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                  - Patterns and trends in the tracking data
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  - Personal insights and realizations
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  - Challenges and breakthroughs
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                  - Future goals and aspirations related to this area
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

            
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                  {
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                    "title": "Reflection on Your #{tracker_name} Journey",
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                    "chapters": [
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                      {
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                        "title": "Chapter title",
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                        "order": 1,
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                        "sections": [
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                          {
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                            "title": "Section title",
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                            "order": 1,
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                            "questions": [
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                              {
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                                "text": "Question text here?",
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                                "order": 1
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                              }
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                            ]
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                          }
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                      }
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                  }
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

            
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response, no other text.
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

              end
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367.
