      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

              def make_gemini_request(prompt)
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                uri = URI("#{GEMINI_API_BASE}/models/#{@model}:generateContent?key=#{@api_key}")
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                request.body = {
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                  contents: [
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                    {
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                      parts: [
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                        {
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                          text: prompt
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                        }
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                    }
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                  ],
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                  generationConfig: {
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                    temperature: @temperature,
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                    maxOutputTokens: @max_tokens,
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                    topP: 0.8,
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                    topK: 40
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                  }
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                }.to_json
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                response = make_request(request, uri)
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                if response['error']
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                  raise "Gemini API Error: #{response['error']['message']}"
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                end
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                response
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

              end
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

            
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            

              def make_request(request, uri)
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                http.use_ssl = true
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                http.read_timeout = 60
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                http.open_timeout = 30
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

                
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

                if response.code != '200'
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  raise "HTTP Error: #{response.code} - #{response.message}"
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                end
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                raise "Request failed: #{e.message}"
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

              end
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

            
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

              def parse_interview_outline_response(response)
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                content = response.dig('candidates', 0, 'content', 'parts', 0, 'text')
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                return { error: 'No content in response' } unless content
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

            
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

                begin
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                  cleaned_content = content.strip.gsub(/^```json\s*/, '').gsub(/\s*```$/, '')
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                  JSON.parse(cleaned_content, symbolize_names: true)
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

                rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            

                  { error: "Failed to parse response: #{e.message}", raw_content: content }
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            

                end
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            

              end
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            

            
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            

              def parse_section_questions_response(response)
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

                content = response.dig('candidates', 0, 'content', 'parts', 0, 'text')
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                return [] unless content
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

            
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                begin

              def build_unlimited_questions_prompt(context, num_questions)
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                existing_questions_text = context[:existing_questions].join("\n- ")
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                answered_context = if context[:answered_questions].present?
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                  context[:answered_questions].map do |qa|
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                    "Q: #{qa[:question]}\nA: #{qa[:answer]}"
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                  end.join("\n\n")
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                else
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                  "No questions answered yet"
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                end
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

                
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

                  You are an expert interviewer continuing an in-depth interview session.
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

                  
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

                  INTERVIEW TOPIC: #{context[:topic]}
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            

                  
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            

                  EXISTING QUESTIONS ALREADY ASKED:
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            

                  - #{existing_questions_text}
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            

                  
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            

                  CONTEXT FROM ANSWERED QUESTIONS:
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            

                  #{answered_context}
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            

                  
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            

                  TASK: Generate #{num_questions} NEW interview questions that:
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            

                  - Continue exploring the topic in greater depth
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            

                  - Build on themes that emerged from the answers given
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            

            

                  - DO NOT repeat or rephrase any existing questions
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            

                  - Maintain the conversational and engaging tone
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            

                  - Progress naturally from what has been discussed
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            

            

                  - Explore new angles and perspectives
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            

            

                  - Remain relevant to the original topic
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            

            

                  
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            

            

                  - All questions must be unique and not covered before
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            

            

                  - Questions should be open-ended and thought-provoking
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            

            

                  - Consider the flow and context of the conversation so far
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            

            

                  - Mix both follow-up themes and entirely new aspects
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            

            

                  - Maintain interview quality and depth
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            

            

                  
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            

            

                  RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON only):
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            

            

                  {
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            

            

                    "questions": [
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            

            

                      "First new question text here?",
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            

            

                      "Second new question text here?",
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            

            

                      ...
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513.

      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            

            

                  }
          
      515.

      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            

            

                  Generate only the JSON response with exactly #{num_questions} new questions.
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            

            

              end
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519.

              def parse_unlimited_questions_response(response)

              # Access token expires in 1 hour

                def encode_access_token(user_id)

    9. 
            

            

                  payload = {
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    user_id: user_id,

    11.

      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  JWT.encode(payload, secret_key, 'HS256')

    14.

                def encode_refresh_token(user_id)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

      23.

                def decode_token(token)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  decoded = JWT.decode(token, secret_key, true, { algorithm: 'HS256' })
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  decoded[0]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                rescue JWT::ExpiredSignature
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  raise StandardError, 'Token has expired'
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  raise StandardError, 'Invalid token'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                def generate_token_pair(user_id)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

    35.

    37. 
            

            

                  }

    38. 
            

            

                end

              def start_session(session_id)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                @mutex.synchronize do
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  @session_id = session_id
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @timings[session_id] = {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    start_time: Time.current,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    events: [],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    total_duration: 0

    25. 
            

            

                  }

                  Rails.logger.info "🚀 Performance tracking started for session: #{session_id}"

              def track_event(event_name, metadata = {})
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                result = nil
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if block_given?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  result = yield
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end_time = Time.current
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                else
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  end_time = Time.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # Only track performance data if we have an active session
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if @session_id
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  duration_ms = ((end_time - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  @mutex.synchronize do
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    event_data = {
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      name: event_name,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      start_time: start_time,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49.

      51.

    52. 
            

            

                    }

    53. 
            

            

                    
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    @timings[@session_id][:events] << event_data if @timings[@session_id]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    # Log to Rails logger
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "⏱️ [#{@session_id}] #{event_name}: #{duration_ms}ms #{metadata.to_json}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    # Append to CSV
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    append_to_csv(event_data)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                result
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              def end_session
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                return unless @session_id
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                @mutex.synchronize do
          
      71.

                  if session_data = @timings[@session_id]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    end_time = Time.current
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    session_data[:end_time] = end_time
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    session_data[:total_duration] = ((end_time - session_data[:start_time]) * 1000).round(2)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    # Generate summary
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    generate_summary(session_data)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    # Log final summary
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "🏁 Session #{@session_id} completed in #{session_data[:total_duration]}ms"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  @session_id = nil
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              def get_session_summary(session_id = nil)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                session_id ||= @session_id
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                return nil unless session_id && @timings[session_id]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                session_data = @timings[session_id]
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                events = session_data[:events]
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                {
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  session_id: session_id,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  total_duration_ms: session_data[:total_duration] || 0,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  event_count: events.size,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  events_by_duration: events.sort_by { |e| -e[:duration_ms] },
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  events_by_category: categorize_events(events),
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  bottlenecks: identify_bottlenecks(events)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                }
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              private
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def ensure_csv_exists
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                unless File.exist?(TRACKING_FILE)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  CSV.open(TRACKING_FILE, 'w') do |csv|
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    csv << ['timestamp', 'session_id', 'event_name', 'duration_ms', 'metadata']
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              def append_to_csv(event_data)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                CSV.open(TRACKING_FILE, 'a') do |csv|
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  csv << [
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    event_data[:start_time].iso8601,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    @session_id,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    event_data[:name],
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    event_data[:duration_ms],
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    event_data[:metadata].to_json
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to write to performance CSV: #{e.message}"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def generate_summary(session_data)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                events = session_data[:events]
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                summary = []
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                summary << "# Performance Summary - Session #{@session_id}"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                summary << "**Generated at:** #{Time.current.iso8601}"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                summary << "**Total Duration:** #{session_data[:total_duration]}ms"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                summary << "## Event Timeline"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                summary << "| Event | Duration (ms) | Percentage | Details |"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                summary << "|-------|--------------|------------|---------|"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                total_duration = session_data[:total_duration] || 1
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                events.sort_by { |e| e[:start_time] }.each do |event|
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  percentage = ((event[:duration_ms] / total_duration) * 100).round(1)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  details = event[:metadata].empty? ? "-" : event[:metadata].to_json
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  summary << "| #{event[:name]} | #{event[:duration_ms]} | #{percentage}% | #{details} |"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                summary << "## Performance Analysis"
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                # Identify bottlenecks
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                bottlenecks = identify_bottlenecks(events)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                if bottlenecks.any?
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  summary << "### ⚠️ Bottlenecks Detected"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  summary << ""
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  bottlenecks.each do |bottleneck|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    summary << "- **#{bottleneck[:name]}**: #{bottleneck[:duration_ms]}ms (#{bottleneck[:percentage]}% of total time)"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    if bottleneck[:name].include?('say_command') || bottleneck[:name].include?('polly')
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      summary << "  - 💡 Audio generation is a major bottleneck. Consider:"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Pre-generating audio for common questions"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Using faster TTS voices"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Implementing audio caching"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    elsif bottleneck[:name].include?('api') || bottleneck[:name].include?('network')
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      summary << "  - 💡 Network latency detected. Consider:"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Batch API requests"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Implement request caching"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Use connection pooling"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    elsif bottleneck[:name].include?('database') || bottleneck[:name].include?('query')
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      summary << "  - 💡 Database performance issue. Consider:"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Adding database indexes"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Optimizing queries"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      summary << "    - Implementing query caching"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  summary << ""
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # Categorize events
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                categories = categorize_events(events)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                summary << "### 📊 Time by Category"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                summary << "| Category | Total Time (ms) | Event Count |"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                summary << "|----------|----------------|-------------|"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                categories.each do |category, data|
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  summary << "| #{category} | #{data[:total_ms]} | #{data[:count]} |"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                summary << "## Recommendations"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                summary << ""
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Generate recommendations based on data
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                if session_data[:total_duration] > 5000
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  summary << "- ⚠️ **Total load time exceeds 5 seconds** - Users may experience frustration"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                audio_events = events.select { |e| e[:name].downcase.include?('audio') || e[:name].downcase.include?('polly') || e[:name].downcase.include?('say') }
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                if audio_events.any?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  audio_total = audio_events.sum { |e| e[:duration_ms] }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  audio_percentage = ((audio_total / total_duration) * 100).round(1)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  if audio_percentage > 40
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    summary << "- 🔊 **Audio generation takes #{audio_percentage}% of total time**"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    summary << "  - Consider pre-generating audio during project creation"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    summary << "  - Implement progressive loading (start interview while audio generates)"
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                api_events = events.select { |e| e[:name].downcase.include?('api') || e[:name].downcase.include?('request') }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                if api_events.size > 5
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  summary << "- 🌐 **Multiple API calls detected (#{api_events.size} calls)**"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  summary << "  - Consider batching API requests"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  summary << "  - Implement request parallelization"
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # Write to file
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                File.write(SUMMARY_FILE, summary.join("\n"))
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                # Also append to a historical summary file
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                historical_file = Rails.root.join('log', "performance_history_#{Date.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')}.md")
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                File.open(historical_file, 'a') do |f|
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  f.puts "\n---\n"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  f.puts summary.join("\n")
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "📊 Performance summary written to #{SUMMARY_FILE}"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to generate performance summary: #{e.message}"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              def categorize_events(events)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                categories = {}
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                events.each do |event|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  category = determine_category(event[:name])
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  categories[category] ||= { total_ms: 0, count: 0, events: [] }
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  categories[category][:total_ms] += event[:duration_ms]
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  categories[category][:count] += 1
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  categories[category][:events] << event
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                categories
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              def determine_category(event_name)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                name = event_name.downcase
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                return 'Audio Generation' if name.include?('audio') || name.include?('polly') || name.include?('say') || name.include?('speech')
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                return 'Database' if name.include?('database') || name.include?('query') || name.include?('activerecord')
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                return 'API/Network' if name.include?('api') || name.include?('request') || name.include?('http')
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                return 'File I/O' if name.include?('file') || name.include?('s3') || name.include?('upload') || name.include?('download')
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                return 'Processing' if name.include?('process') || name.include?('generate') || name.include?('compute')
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                'Other'
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              def identify_bottlenecks(events, threshold_percentage = 20)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                return [] if events.empty?
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                total_duration = events.sum { |e| e[:duration_ms] }
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                return [] if total_duration == 0
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                bottlenecks = []
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                events.each do |event|
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  percentage = ((event[:duration_ms] / total_duration) * 100).round(1)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  if percentage >= threshold_percentage
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    bottlenecks << {
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                      name: event[:name],
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                      duration_ms: event[:duration_ms],
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                      percentage: percentage,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                      metadata: event[:metadata]
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    }
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                bottlenecks.sort_by { |b| -b[:duration_ms] }
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

              end
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

            end
          
      282.

            class PresetQuestionsImporter

              def self.import_all

              def initialize

              def import_all
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting preset questions import from #{PRESET_QUESTIONS_DIR}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                yaml_files.each do |file_path|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    import_file(file_path)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @errors << "Error importing #{File.basename(file_path)}: #{e.message}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error importing #{file_path}: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      27.

                  end

    28.

    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30.

                log_summary

              end
          
      33.

              def yaml_files
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                Dir.glob(File.join(PRESET_QUESTIONS_DIR, '*.yaml'))

      39.

              def import_file(file_path)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                filename = File.basename(file_path, '.yaml')
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                yaml_content = YAML.load_file(file_path)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # Add UUID if not present
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                if yaml_content['uuid'].blank?
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  yaml_content['uuid'] = SecureRandom.uuid
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  save_yaml_with_uuid(file_path, yaml_content)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Added UUID to #{filename}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                import_interview_preset(yaml_content, filename)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def save_yaml_with_uuid(file_path, yaml_content)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Reorder content to have uuid at the top
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                ordered_content = {
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  'uuid' => yaml_content['uuid'],
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  'title' => yaml_content['title'],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  'description' => yaml_content['description'],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  'llm_prompt' => yaml_content['llm_prompt'],
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  'questions' => yaml_content['questions']
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                File.write(file_path, ordered_content.to_yaml)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              def import_interview_preset(yaml_content, filename)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                preset = InterviewPreset.find_or_initialize_by(uuid: yaml_content['uuid'])
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                if preset.persisted?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  @updated_count += 1
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Updating existing preset: #{yaml_content['title']}"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                else
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  @imported_count += 1
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Creating new preset: #{yaml_content['title']}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                preset.assign_attributes(
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  title: yaml_content['title'],
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  description: yaml_content['description'],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  category: determine_category(yaml_content['title'], filename),
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  icon_name: determine_icon(yaml_content['title'], filename),
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  order_position: determine_order_position(filename),
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  active: true
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                )
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                preset.save!
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                # Import questions
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                import_questions_for_preset(preset, yaml_content)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93.
