              def import_questions_for_preset(preset, yaml_content)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                # Clear existing questions to avoid duplicates
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                preset.preset_questions.destroy_all
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                questions = yaml_content['questions'] || []
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                questions.each_with_index do |question_text, index|
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  PresetQuestion.create!(
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    interview_preset: preset,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    chapter_title: 'Main Questions',
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    section_title: 'Core Questions',
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    question_text: question_text,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    chapter_order: 1,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    section_order: 1,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    question_order: index + 1
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  )
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Imported #{questions.size} questions for #{preset.title}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def determine_category(title, filename)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # Simple categorization based on keywords in title/filename
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                title_lower = title.downcase
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                filename_lower = filename.downcase
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                case
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('creative') || title_lower.include?('innovation') || filename_lower.include?('creative')
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  'creativity'
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('question') || title_lower.include?('inquiry') || filename_lower.include?('question')
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  'self_inquiry'
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('leadership') || title_lower.include?('influence') || filename_lower.include?('leadership')
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  'leadership'
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('relationship') || title_lower.include?('connection') || filename_lower.include?('relationship')
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  'relationships'
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('mindset') || title_lower.include?('mindful') || title_lower.include?('mental')
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  'mindset'
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                when title_lower.include?('growth') || title_lower.include?('transformation') || title_lower.include?('development')
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  'personal_growth'
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                else
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  'general'
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              def determine_icon(title, filename)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # Simple icon assignment based on category
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                category = determine_category(title, filename)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                case category
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                when 'creativity'
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  'lightbulb.fill'
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                when 'self_inquiry'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  'questionmark.circle.fill'
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                when 'leadership'
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  'person.3.fill'
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                when 'relationships'
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  'heart.fill'
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                when 'mindset'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  'brain.head.profile'
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                when 'personal_growth'
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  'arrow.up.circle.fill'
          
      153.

                else

    154. 
            

            

                  'star.fill'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              def determine_order_position(filename)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Use a hash of the filename to create consistent ordering
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                filename.bytes.sum % 1000
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              def log_summary
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Preset questions import completed: #{@imported_count} imported, #{@updated_count} updated"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                @errors.each { |error| Rails.logger.error error }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            end

    app/services/runware_service.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            # ==============================================================================
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # RunwareService Class
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            #
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            # @description
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            #   A Ruby service for the Runware Text-to-Image REST API integrated into Rails.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            #   This service handles authentication, API request construction, and response
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            #   parsing for generating images based on textual prompts.
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            #
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            # @usage
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            #   # Generate a square icon (1:1)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            #   runware = RunwareService.new
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            #   icon_url = runware.create_icon(prompt: "a glowing nebula shaped like a cat")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            #   
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            #   # Generate a portrait photo (9:16)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            #   portrait_url = runware.create_portrait_photo(prompt: "astronaut meditating in a field of glowing flowers")
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            #   
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            #   # Generate a tall photo (6:19)  
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            #   tall_url = runware.create_tall_photo(prompt: "a lone monolith on a distant planet, two moons in the sky")
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            #
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            # ==============================================================================
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            class RunwareService
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              include HTTParty
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # The base URI for the Runware v1 REST API.
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              base_uri 'https://api.runware.ai/v1'
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # The overall aesthetic prompt to be appended to every request.
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # This defines the "Cosmic Lofi" look and feel.
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              COSMIC_LOFI_AESTHETIC = [
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                'Cosmic Lofi aesthetic',
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                'calm, introspective, and magical digital space',
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                'a quiet corner of the universe at midnight',
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                'sophisticated and modern with depth and softness',
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                'deep near-black blues and purples',
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                'muted, luminous pastel highlights like distant nebulae or soft aurora lights',
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                'serene, cinematic',
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                '4k, high detail'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              ].join(', ').freeze
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # The negative prompt to steer the AI away from undesired elements.
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              NEGATIVE_AESTHETIC = [
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                'pure black',
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                'harsh lighting',
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                'oversaturated colors',
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                'bright jarring colors',
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                'chaotic composition',
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                'blurry, low quality, pixelated',
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                'text, watermark, signature, username'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              ].join(', ').freeze
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              # A capable default model that works well for a variety of styles.
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # HiDream-I1 Full is the highest quality HiDream model with sharp detail,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # accurate prompts, full LoRA compatibility, and is fully uncensored.
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              DEFAULT_MODEL = 'hidream:i1-full'.freeze
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def initialize(api_key: ENV['RUNWARE_API_KEY'])
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, 'RUNWARE_API_KEY environment variable not set.' if api_key.nil? || api_key.empty?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                @api_key = api_key
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # Set default headers for all requests made by this class instance.
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                self.class.headers(
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  'Authorization' => "Bearer #{@api_key}",
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69.

              # Generates a square image (1:1 aspect ratio), ideal for icons.
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              #
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The main subject of the image.
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              # @param size [Integer] The width and height of the image in pixels. Must be divisible by 64.
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Response containing image URL or error details
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              def create_icon(prompt:, size: 1024)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Starting icon generation for prompt: '#{prompt}'")
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                unless size % 64 == 0
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Image size must be divisible by 64. Received: #{size}")
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Image size must be divisible by 64" }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                create_image_with_polling(
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  prompt: prompt,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  width: size,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  height: size
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                )
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end

              # Generates a portrait image (9:16 aspect ratio).
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              #
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The main subject of the image.
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              # @param height [Integer] The height of the image. Width will be calculated to match the 9:16 aspect ratio and rounded to the nearest multiple of 64.
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Response containing image URL or error details
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def create_portrait_photo(prompt:, height: 1344)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Starting 9:16 portrait generation for prompt: '#{prompt}'")
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                # Calculate width for a 9:16 aspect ratio and ensure it's divisible by 64.
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                width = calculate_dimension(height * 9.0 / 16.0)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                create_image_with_polling(
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  prompt: prompt,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  width: width,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  height: height
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                )
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111.

              # Generates a very tall image (6:19 aspect ratio).
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              # Note: 6:19 is an unconventional ratio. This method creates an image that approximates it.
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              #
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The main subject of the image.
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              # @param height [Integer] The height of the image. Width will be calculated to match the 6:19 aspect ratio and rounded to the nearest multiple of 64.
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Response containing image URL or error details
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              def create_tall_photo(prompt:, height: 1984)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Starting 6:19 tall photo generation for prompt: '#{prompt}'")
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Calculate width for a 6:19 aspect ratio and ensure it's divisible by 64.
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                width = calculate_dimension(height * 6.0 / 19.0)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                create_image_with_polling(
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  prompt: prompt,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  width: width,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  height: height
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                )
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130.

              # Generic method for creating images with custom dimensions
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              #
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The main subject of the image.
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              # @param width [Integer] Image width (must be divisible by 64).
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              # @param height [Integer] Image height (must be divisible by 64).
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              # @param model [String] Optional model override.
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Response containing image URL or error details
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def create_custom_image(prompt:, width:, height:, model: DEFAULT_MODEL)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Starting custom image generation: #{width}x#{height} for prompt: '#{prompt}'")
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                unless width % 64 == 0 && height % 64 == 0
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Image dimensions must be divisible by 64. Received: #{width}x#{height}")
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Image dimensions must be divisible by 64" }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                create_image_with_polling(
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  prompt: prompt,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  width: width,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  height: height,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  model: model
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                )
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              private
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156.

              # ============================================================================
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              # Private Helper Methods

    158. 
            

            

              # ============================================================================
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              # Core method to submit an image generation task and poll for the result.
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              # The Runware REST API is synchronous and returns the result directly.
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              #
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              # @param prompt [String] The user's prompt.
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              # @param width [Integer] Image width.
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              # @param height [Integer] Image height.
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              # @param model [String] The model to use.
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Response with success status and either image_url or error
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              def create_image_with_polling(prompt:, width:, height:, model: DEFAULT_MODEL)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                task_uuid = SecureRandom.uuid
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                full_prompt = "#{prompt}, #{COSMIC_LOFI_AESTHETIC}"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                payload = [{
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  taskType: 'imageInference',
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  taskUUID: task_uuid,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  positivePrompt: full_prompt,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  negativePrompt: NEGATIVE_AESTHETIC,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  width: width,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  height: height,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  model: model,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  steps: 30, # A good balance of quality and speed.
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  numberResults: 1
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                }]
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug("Submitting task #{task_uuid} with payload: #{payload.to_json}")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                begin
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  response = self.class.post('/', body: payload.to_json)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  unless response.success?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("HTTP Error: #{response.code} - #{response.message}")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Response Body: #{response.body}")
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: "HTTP Error: #{response.code} - #{response.message}" }
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  parsed_response = response.parsed_response
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug("Received response: #{parsed_response.to_json}")
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  # Check for API-level errors
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  if parsed_response['error']
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("API Error: #{parsed_response['error']}")
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: parsed_response['error'] }
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  # Find the result corresponding to our task UUID
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  task_result = parsed_response['data']&.find { |item| item['taskUUID'] == task_uuid }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  if task_result && task_result['imageURL']
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("Successfully generated image for task #{task_uuid}.")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    return { 
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      success: true, 
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      image_url: task_result['imageURL'],
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      task_uuid: task_uuid,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                      width: width,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      height: height
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    }
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  else
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("API response did not contain a valid image URL for task #{task_uuid}.")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug("Full response data: #{parsed_response['data']}")
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: "API response did not contain a valid image URL" }
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                rescue HTTParty::Error, SocketError => e
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Network or HTTParty error: #{e.message}")
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Network error: #{e.message}" }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Unexpected error in Runware service: #{e.message}")
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Unexpected error: #{e.message}" }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              # Helper to round a dimension to the nearest multiple of 64, as required by the API.
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              #
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              # @param value [Float] The calculated dimension.
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              # @return [Integer] The dimension rounded to the nearest multiple of 64.
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def calculate_dimension(value)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                (value / 64.0).round * 64
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            end
          
      239.

    app/services/s3_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    406 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 406 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class S3Service
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def initialize(user)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                @user = user
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              end
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def generate_upload_url(record_id:, record_type:, filename:, content_type: 'audio/mp4', expires_in: 3600)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                key = generate_s3_key(record_id: record_id, record_type: record_type, filename: filename)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 UPLOAD URL GENERATION =========="
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Content Type: #{content_type}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Record Type: #{record_type}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Record ID: #{record_id}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AWS Region: #{aws_region}"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AWS Access Key ID present: #{aws_access_key_id.present?}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AWS Secret Key present: #{aws_secret_access_key.present?}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                begin
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  )
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # Test bucket access
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    s3_client.head_bucket(bucket: bucket_name)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "✅ Bucket access verified"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "❌ Bucket access error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  presigner = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3_client)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  url = presigner.presigned_url(
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    :put_object, 
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name, 
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    key: key, 
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    expires_in: expires_in,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    content_type: content_type
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  )
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Generated presigned upload URL successfully"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "URL (first 150 chars): #{url[0..150]}..."
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 UPLOAD URL GENERATION =========="
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    url: url,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    s3_url: "https://#{bucket_name}.s3.amazonaws.com/#{key}",
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    key: key,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 UPLOAD URL GENERATION FAILED"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Backtrace:"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 UPLOAD URL GENERATION =========="
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Return mock URL in development if S3 fails
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  if Rails.env.development?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "🔄 Returning mock URL for development"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      url: "https://mock-s3-upload-url.com/#{key}",
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      s3_url: "https://#{bucket_name}.s3.amazonaws.com/#{key}",
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      key: key,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      bucket: bucket_name
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    raise e
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              def generate_playback_url(record_id:, record_type:, filename:, content_type: 'audio/mp4', expires_in: 3600)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                key = generate_s3_key(record_id: record_id, record_type: record_type, filename: filename)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  region: aws_region,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                )
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                presigner = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3_client)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                url = presigner.presigned_url(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  :get_object, 
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  bucket: bucket_name, 
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  key: key, 
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  expires_in: expires_in,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  response_content_type: content_type
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                )
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Generated playback URL: #{url}"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                url
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              def download_audio_data(record_id:, record_type:, filename:)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                key = generate_s3_key(record_id: record_id, record_type: record_type, filename: filename)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                begin
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  )
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  response = s3_client.get_object(bucket: bucket_name, key: key)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  audio_data = response.body.read
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully downloaded audio data (#{audio_data.bytesize} bytes)"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  audio_data
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD FAILED"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # Return nil so the calling code can handle the fallback
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              def download_audio_to_file(record_id:, record_type:, filename:, target_path:)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                key = generate_s3_key(record_id: record_id, record_type: record_type, filename: filename)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD TO FILE =========="
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Target Path: #{target_path}"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                begin
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  )
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  s3_client.get_object(
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    response_target: target_path,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    key: key
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  )
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully downloaded audio to file"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD TO FILE =========="
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  true
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD TO FILE FAILED"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 AUDIO DOWNLOAD TO FILE =========="
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  false
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              # Store export file in S3 and return shareable URL
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def store_export_file(content:, filename:, project_id: nil, format:, expires_in: 7.days)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                key = generate_export_s3_key(filename: filename, project_id: project_id, format: format)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 EXPORT FILE STORAGE =========="
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Content Size: #{content.bytesize} bytes"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Format: #{format}"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                begin
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  )
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  # Upload the content to S3
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  s3_client.put_object(
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    key: key,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    body: content,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    content_type: content_type_for_format(format),
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    content_disposition: "attachment; filename=\"#{filename}\"",
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    # Set expiration using object tagging or lifecycle policy
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    expires: Time.current + expires_in
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  )
