      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  # Generate a presigned URL for sharing
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  presigner = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3_client)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  share_url = presigner.presigned_url(
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    :get_object,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    key: key,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    expires_in: expires_in.to_i,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    response_content_disposition: "attachment; filename=\"#{filename}\""
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  )
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully stored export file and generated share URL"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Share URL (first 150 chars): #{share_url[0..150]}..."
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 EXPORT FILE STORAGE =========="
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  {
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    share_url: share_url,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    s3_key: key,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    expires_at: Time.current + expires_in
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  }
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 EXPORT FILE STORAGE FAILED"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Backtrace:"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 EXPORT FILE STORAGE =========="
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  # Return mock URL in development if S3 fails
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  if Rails.env.development?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "🔄 Returning mock share URL for development"
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    {
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      share_url: "https://mock-s3-share-url.com/#{key}",
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      s3_key: key,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      bucket: bucket_name,
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                      expires_at: Time.current + expires_in
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    }
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  else
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    raise e
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

              end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              # Extract S3 key from full S3 URL
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              def extract_s3_key_from_url(s3_url)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                uri = URI.parse(s3_url)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                uri.path.delete_prefix('/')
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              # Upload audio data directly to S3 (used by Polly service)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              def upload_audio_data(key, audio_stream)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 AUDIO DATA UPLOAD =========="
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                begin
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  )
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  s3_client.put_object(
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                    key: key,
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                    body: audio_stream,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    content_type: 'audio/mp3'
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  )
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully uploaded audio data to S3"
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 AUDIO DATA UPLOAD =========="
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  true
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 AUDIO DATA UPLOAD FAILED"
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 AUDIO DATA UPLOAD =========="
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

              end
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              # Get presigned URL for a given S3 key
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

              def get_presigned_url(key, expires_in: 3600)
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  region: aws_region,
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                  secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                )
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                presigner = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3_client)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                presigner.presigned_url(
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  :get_object,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  bucket: bucket_name,
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  key: key,
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  expires_in: expires_in
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                )
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

              end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              # Download audio segment using its S3 key to local file path
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

              def download_audio_segment(s3_key, local_file_path)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 AUDIO SEGMENT DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{s3_key}"
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Target Path: #{local_file_path}"
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                begin
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  )
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  s3_client.get_object(
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                    response_target: local_file_path,
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                    key: s3_key
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  )
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully downloaded audio segment to file"
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "File size: #{File.size(local_file_path)} bytes"
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 AUDIO SEGMENT DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                  
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                  true
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 AUDIO SEGMENT DOWNLOAD FAILED"
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 AUDIO SEGMENT DOWNLOAD =========="
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                  
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

              end
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

            
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

              # Store podcast export file in S3 and return download URL
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

              def store_podcast_export(file_path:, filename:, project_id:, content_type: 'audio/mp4', expires_in: 7.days)
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                bucket_name = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :s3_bucket) || ENV['AWS_S3_BUCKET'] || 'vibewrite-audio-dev'
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                key = generate_podcast_s3_key(filename: filename, project_id: project_id)
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "========== S3 PODCAST EXPORT STORAGE =========="
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bucket: #{bucket_name}"
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Key: #{key}"
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "File Path: #{file_path}"
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "File Size: #{File.size(file_path)} bytes"
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "User ID: #{@user.id}"
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Content Type: #{content_type}"
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                begin
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                  s3_client = Aws::S3::Client.new(
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                    region: aws_region,
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                    access_key_id: aws_access_key_id,
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                    secret_access_key: aws_secret_access_key
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                  )
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                  
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                  # Upload the file to S3
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                  File.open(file_path, 'rb') do |file|
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                    s3_client.put_object(
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                      bucket: bucket_name,
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                      key: key,
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                      body: file,
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                      content_type: content_type,
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                      content_disposition: "attachment; filename=\"#{filename}\"",
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                      # Set expiration
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                      expires: Time.current + expires_in,
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                      metadata: {
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                        'user-id' => @user.id.to_s,
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                        'project-id' => project_id.to_s,
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                        'export-type' => 'podcast',
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                        'created-at' => Time.current.iso8601
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                      }
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                    )
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                  end
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                  
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                  # Generate a presigned URL for downloading
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                  presigner = Aws::S3::Presigner.new(client: s3_client)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                  download_url = presigner.presigned_url(
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                    :get_object,
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                    key: key,
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                    expires_in: expires_in.to_i,
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                    response_content_disposition: "attachment; filename=\"#{filename}\"",
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                    response_content_type: content_type
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                  )
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                  
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "✅ Successfully stored podcast export and generated download URL"
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Download URL (first 150 chars): #{download_url[0..150]}..."
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "========== END S3 PODCAST EXPORT STORAGE =========="
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                  
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                  {
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

                    download_url: download_url,
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

                    s3_key: key,
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            

                    bucket: bucket_name,
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                    expires_at: Time.current + expires_in
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                  }
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "❌ S3 PODCAST EXPORT STORAGE FAILED"
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Class: #{e.class}"
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error Message: #{e.message}"
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Backtrace:"
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "========== END S3 PODCAST EXPORT STORAGE =========="
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                  
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                  # Return mock URL in development if S3 fails
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                  if Rails.env.development?
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "🔄 Returning mock podcast URL for development"
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                    {
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

                      download_url: "https://mock-s3-podcast-url.com/#{key}",
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                      s3_key: key,
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                      bucket: bucket_name,
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                      expires_at: Time.current + expires_in
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                    }
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

                  else
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

                    raise e
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                  end
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                end
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

              end
          
      426.

              def environment_prefix
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            

                case Rails.env
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

                when 'production'
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                  'production/'
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

                when 'staging'
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                  'staging/'
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            

                else
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            

                  'dev/'
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437.

      438.

      439.

              def generate_s3_key(record_id:, record_type:, filename:)
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

                prefix = environment_prefix
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

                case record_type.to_s.downcase
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            

                when 'audiosegment', 'audio_segment'
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}audio_segments/#{record_id}/#{filename}"
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            

                when 'logentry', 'log_entry', 'vibelog'
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}vibelog/#{@user.id}/#{record_id}_#{Time.current.to_i}.m4a"
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            

                else
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}#{record_type.to_s.downcase}/#{@user.id}/#{record_id}/#{filename}"
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

                end
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

              end
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

            
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

              def generate_export_s3_key(filename:, project_id: nil, format:)
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                prefix = environment_prefix
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

                timestamp = Time.current.to_i
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                if project_id
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}exports/projects/#{@user.id}/#{project_id}/#{timestamp}_#{filename}"
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                else
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                  "#{prefix}exports/vibelog/#{@user.id}/#{timestamp}_#{filename}"
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                end
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

              end
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

            
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

              def generate_podcast_s3_key(filename:, project_id:)
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                prefix = environment_prefix
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                timestamp = Time.current.to_i
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                "#{prefix}exports/podcasts/#{@user.id}/#{project_id}/#{timestamp}_#{filename}"
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

              end
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

            
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

              def content_type_for_format(format)
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

                case format.to_s.downcase
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                when 'csv'
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                  'text/csv'
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                when 'pdf'
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                  'application/pdf'
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                when 'docx'
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                  'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document'
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                else
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                  'text/plain'
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                end
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

              end
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

            
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

              def aws_region
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

                Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :region) || ENV['AWS_REGION'] || 'us-east-1'
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

              end
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            

            
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            

              def aws_access_key_id
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            

                Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :access_key_id) || ENV['AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID']
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            

              end
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            

            
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            

              def aws_secret_access_key
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            

                Rails.application.credentials.dig(:aws, :secret_access_key) || ENV['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            

              end
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            

            end

            class TranscriptContentAssemblerService

              def self.process_transcript(project_id)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                project = Project.find_by(id: project_id)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                unless project
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "TranscriptContentAssemblerService: Project with id #{project_id} not found"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Project not found" }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                begin
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Starting transcript processing for project #{project_id}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # Simulate LLM processing delay
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  simulate_processing_delay
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  # Get all transcribed audio segments for this project
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  transcribed_segments = project.audio_segments
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                               .where(upload_status: 'transcribed')
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                               .includes(:question => { :section => :chapter })
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                               .order('questions.order ASC')
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  if transcribed_segments.empty?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "No transcribed segments found for project #{project_id}"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: 'No transcribed content available' }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # Generate structured content (for backward compatibility)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  structured_content = generate_structured_content(project, transcribed_segments)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # Create or update transcript record with structured content only
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  transcript = project.transcript || project.build_transcript
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    status: 'processing_raw',
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    raw_structured_content_json: structured_content,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    last_updated: Time.current
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  )
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Transcript processing completed for project #{project_id}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  { success: true, transcript_id: transcript.id }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Transcript processing error for project #{project_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  project.update!(status: 'failed')
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48.

              def self.finalize_transcript(project_id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                project = Project.find_by(id: project_id)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                unless project
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "TranscriptContentAssemblerService: Project with id #{project_id} not found for finalization"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Project not found" }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                begin
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Finalizing transcript for project #{project_id}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # Get all transcribed audio segments for this project
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                                               .where(upload_status: 'transcribed')
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                                               .includes(:question => { :section => :chapter })
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                                               .order('questions.order ASC')
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  if transcribed_segments.empty?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "No transcribed segments found for project #{project_id}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: 'No transcribed content available' }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # Generate both structured content and raw plaintext content
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  structured_content = generate_structured_content(project, transcribed_segments)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  raw_transcript = generate_raw_transcript(project, transcribed_segments)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Create or update transcript record with both formats
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  transcript = project.transcript || project.build_transcript
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    status: 'raw_ready',
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    raw_structured_content_json: structured_content,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    raw_content: raw_transcript,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    last_updated: Time.current
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  )
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  # Enqueue editing job to polish the complete transcript
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  TranscriptEditingJob.perform_later(project.id)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Transcript finalization completed for project #{project_id}"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  { success: true, transcript_id: transcript.id }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Transcript finalization error for project #{project_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  project.update!(status: 'failed')
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95.

              def self.generate_complete_transcript(project_id, enqueue_editing_job: true)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                project = Project.find(project_id)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                begin
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Generating complete transcript for project #{project_id}"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  # Get all transcribed audio segments for this project
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  transcribed_segments = project.audio_segments
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                                               .where(upload_status: 'transcribed')
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                                               .includes(:question => { :section => :chapter })
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                                               .order('questions.order ASC')
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  if transcribed_segments.empty?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "No transcribed segments found for project #{project_id}"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: 'No transcribed content available' }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # Generate raw plaintext transcript
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  raw_transcript = generate_raw_transcript(project, transcribed_segments)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  # Update transcript record with complete raw content
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  transcript = project.transcript || project.build_transcript
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  transcript.update!(
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    status: 'raw_ready',
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    raw_content: raw_transcript,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    last_updated: Time.current
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  )
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  # Enqueue editing job to polish the complete transcript
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  if enqueue_editing_job
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    TranscriptEditingJob.perform_later(project.id)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Complete transcript generation completed for project #{project_id}"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  { success: true, transcript_id: transcript.id }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Complete transcript generation error for project #{project_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  project.update!(status: 'failed')
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              private
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              def self.simulate_processing_delay
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                # Simulate realistic LLM processing time (3-10 seconds)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                delay = rand(3..10)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Simulating transcript processing delay: #{delay} seconds"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                sleep(delay) if Rails.env.development?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              def self.generate_structured_content(project, transcribed_segments)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                content = []
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                # Group segments by chapter and section
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                chapters_data = group_segments_by_structure(transcribed_segments)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                chapters_data.each do |chapter_info|
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  # Add chapter header
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  content << {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    type: 'chapter',
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    chapterId: chapter_info[:chapter].id,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    title: chapter_info[:chapter].title,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    text: nil,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    audioSegmentId: nil
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  chapter_info[:sections].each do |section_info|
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    # Add section header if section exists
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    if section_info[:section]
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      content << {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        type: 'section',
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                        sectionId: section_info[:section].id,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                        title: section_info[:section].title,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                        text: nil,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                        audioSegmentId: nil
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      }
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    # Process each question's transcription into structured paragraphs
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    section_info[:segments].each do |segment|
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      structured_paragraphs = structure_transcription_text(
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                        segment.transcription_text, 
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                        segment.question&.text
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      )
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                      structured_paragraphs.each do |paragraph_text|
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                        content << {
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                          type: 'paragraph',
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                          chapterId: chapter_info[:chapter].id,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                          sectionId: section_info[:section]&.id,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                          questionId: segment.question&.id,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                          text: paragraph_text,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                          audioSegmentId: segment.id
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                        }
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                content
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def self.group_segments_by_structure(segments)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                chapters = {}
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                segments.each do |segment|
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  question = segment.question
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  next unless question
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  section = question.section
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  chapter = section.chapter
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  chapters[chapter.id] ||= {
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    chapter: chapter,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    sections: {}
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  section_id = section&.id || 'no_section'
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  chapters[chapter.id][:sections][section_id] ||= {
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    section: section,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    segments: []
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  chapters[chapter.id][:sections][section_id][:segments] << segment
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                # Convert to sorted array
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226.
